title: Nicolas BIGIRIMANA na Lambert MUHIMPUNDU BAKWURUYE KWIHANA
content:
Mur’iyi minsi hariko haribonekeza mu gihugu cacu ibimenyetso Uhoraho Imana yabuye kuva kera ikoresheje abahanuzi batandukanye, abantu biyadukiza bakigira ibi na biriya ntibatinye no guhindukiza ijambo ry’Imana ryanditswe muri Bibiliya Yera.  Ishengero rya Yesu Kristo Ihanga Ryera ry’Imana ryahamagariwe kuzigama ukuri kw’ijambo ry’Imana ntirishobora kwihanganira abahona kubera ubuzimire basukwamwo n’abo bariko barakubagurwa n’impwemu zihumanye biyitirira amasezerano Uhoraho Imana yahaye Ihanga ry’Abarundi.

Mwarumvise umugabo yitwa Muhimpundu Lambert yiyimikiye kuba umwami n’umuherezi, amategeko y’igihugu akamuta mu mvuto. Uyo yabanje kuza kwabura ubuhanuzi Ihanga Ryera ry’Imana rihabga hanyuma atamaze kabiri anyererera mu bgibone. Yasutse abantu batari bake hanyuma mu kurogota kwiwe atangura kugenda arigisha abantu ngo: “Kristo ni ikivume!” mu guca kubiri n’ivyanditswe muri[1Abikorinto 12:3]. Abakurikiye inyigisho z’umugararizo ziwe bamerewe nabi mu mabohero yo mu Rutana, Gitega, Ngozi na Bujumbura. Hadashize kabiri, uwundi nawe yanduye nya mpwemu y’ubgibone ikubagura abantu banse gukizwa neza kugira ngo bashike ku musaraba w’uwabambge agacungura abaremwe bose.

Uwo nawe ni Nicolas Bigirimana avuka mu ntara ya Gitega mugabo bakaba barimukiye mw’Ishatanya ryo muri Komine KINYINYA mu ntara ya RUYIGI. Yaragize ivyago araraswa mu magume aca aja kuvurirwa mu gihugu ca Tanzaniya aho yahavuye aronkera amahirwe yo kujanwa gutura mu gihugu ca AUSTRALIYA. Ubu aba mur’ico gihugu muri Qweensland ahitwa Brisbane. Nti twotaye umwanya tuvuga ivyiwe kuko ntari ico yivugako ari ahubgo abamuzi bavuga yuko afise akagorane. Umuco w’Imana ah’uri ntunyegezwa. Dushimye kugira ico tumuvuzeko kugira ngo dukemure abantu bahendwa bagasahurwa utwabo canke bagasukwa mu rupfu kubera ubugunge bg’ibikoresho vya satani. Hariho mur’abo biyita abakozi b’Imana, abahanuzi n’abasemerezi baribisha uruyeri, bagakora icaha co gufata abakenyezi ku nguvu hakaba n’abafise akagwara ko mu mutwe bita (Narcistic Personalty disorder) twokwita “Nshakagutazirwa” gatuma bata abantu mu kaga bakoresheje ibinyoma.

Kw’igenekerezo rya mbere Nzero uyu mwaka w’i 2024, uwoNicolas Bigirimanayarubahutse kwifata amajwi arayanyanyagiza ku mihora ngurukanamajambo avuga yuko yiyimikiye kuba “Umwami w’abami” n’”Umuherezi Mukuru” akongerako n’ayandi majambo yo kwigira utarabaho kw’isi. Yagumye asubiramwo amarogotano yiwe mu majwi yifata kenshi na bugingo n’uyu munsi.

Mu yandi majambo menshi uyoNikola Bigirimanaavuga yiyita Umwami n’umuhanuzi, yerekana yuko atoragura ubuhanuzi buvugwa hirya no hino ku mbuga akabgiyitirira kandi bikamunanira kubujanisha n’ijambo ry’Imana kuko ata n’iryo asoma ngo atahure.

Nikola Bigirimana, avuga yuko Imana yamuhaye amasezerano ya Adamu na Eva, Mose na Eliya, Dawidi na Salomo. Vuba azokwongerako n’aya Mariya na Yozefu! Ivy’avyuga n’ikimenyetso cerekanako abamukunda bomwirukira kwa muganga kuko aguma anicurako bomugirira nabi bakoresheje amangetengete. Iyo atanguye kuvuga niho umuntu amenyera ico ari kuko aca anyererera mu vyiyumviro vy’ibuzamyi no guhahamuka kubera ivyo yakorewe. Ntawoha agaciro ivyo avuga. Muzohore musuzumisha ijambo ry’Imana impwemu zose ziserura n’ibikorwa vyazo bizobabagaragariza.

Abo bagabo uko ari babiri ico bahuriyeko n’uko bose basuka abantu bakabata mu kaga kandi bagacurika Ivyanditswe Vyera mu kwiyitirira amasezerano Uhoraho Imana yahaye ihanga ry’Abarundi. Uwobahanura yobasaba kwakira Yesu Kristo kubabera Umwami n’umukizwa w’ubugingingo bgabo bagaca bihana ivyaha bagendana bakezwa.

Umwami Yesu Kristo Yamamare!

title: Inzira indwi zo gutabara no gukiza igihugu c’Uburundi.
content: Ni igitabo kidonda ivyerekeye urutonde rw’Uboraho Imana abantu benshi birengagiza. Abarongora igihugu canke ishengero baciye kubiri n’urwo rutonde baba bakwegere akarambaraye abo barongoye. Iyo umurongozi arimwo impwemu mbi ababa mu gihugu n’igihugu ubgaco kirakubagugwa n’inzara, ubukene, akarenganyo n’ibiza. Uwo muntu atabogojwe n’intwari Imana iravyimorera igakoresha ibintu biteye ubgo nk’ivyago cumi kandi abifatanije nawe mu caha bakahagwa. Ibikiza igihugu si imigambge, amoko, amasezerano y’abantu, imigwi canke imfashanyo zitangwa n’ibihugu vyo hanze. Igihugu gikizwa no kwubakira ku rutonde rwashinzwe n’Imana. Ibikogwa biboneka atari amajambo n’amanama niryo soko ry’iterambere.Ababishoboye bogisoma kirimwo ingene twova mu ngorane zose twikwegera. Uyu mwanditsi avugamwo ivyerekeye urutonde Imana yashinze kuva ikirema isi muri rusangi mugabo ageze kuvyerekeye Uburundi agatomora neza ivyokorwa mu maguru masha kugira ngo Abarundi dutere imbere mu mibano, mu ndero, mu ntwaro, mu butunzi, mw’iterambere, muvyo twemera, mu gutumatumanako, no mukwidagadura…Indongozi zikoreye ku buhinga butangwa mur’iki gitabu twotera imbere tukarengana n’ibindi bihugu. Igihugu gitezwa imbere n’abahinga, incabgenge abanyengabire n’abakunda igihugu bakorera mu kugororoka. Amasezerano ko ashitse umwe wese yitegurire gukorera muvyo Imana yamugeze [Zaburi 127:1-5]

title: Imburi ya nyuma: Ngaho ni mwihane mwezwe vya bihe birabashikiye.
content:
IHANE MWEZWE MWITEGURIRE INGAJI Y’UHORAHO MU BURUNDI

Tumaze imyaka 35 twumvise ivyerekeye amasezerano Uhoraho Imana yahaye ihanga ry’Abarundi. Dutangure kuyasengera haheze imyaka 25, Mpwemu Yera yaratubariye ivyiza biyarimwo, aca atubarira yuko ar’ayacu azoyadushitsako.Haheze imyaka 10 Umuremyi w’isi n’ijuru adutegetse kuyatangariza abantu bose adutuma yuko bokwihana bakezwa kugira ngo ntibazohitanwe n’inkota ya malayika muranduzi.Twakwiragiye intara zose z’igihugu c’Uburundi dushika no mu mpande zine z’isi tumenyesha abantu bose ivyerekeye ayo masezerano tunabasaba kwihana no kwiyeza kugira ngo bazibonere ubgiza bg’Imana. Uretse no kwishikira hose twaruguruye imihora yo gushikira bose turanabicisha no mu bitabo, ibinyamakuru n’amaradiyo ku buryo ata murundi n’umwe atayumvise. Imana yaranahagurukije abasemerezi b’abarundi n’abavugishwa mva makungu kugira ngo baburire Abarundi bose.Mur’iyo myaka 10 yo gusemerera twahuye na vyinshi. Baratwise abasazi, abagwanya amaleta, abazimiye n’ayandi mazina y’urwanko mugabo Uhoraho Imana yaraturemesheje ngo dushikame dushir’amanga ari kumwe natwe. Abatwiganye bose bakagomba kwiyitirira umugabi w’Imana, bamwe barapfunzwe abandi baricwa n’ipfuhe ry’ Imana. Hariho abumvise ivyiza vy’ayo masezerano baca bariyimika, biyimikira ihanga Imana itabahaye kubera amarangamutima yabo. Abazwi muribo ni Dr KATIKATI Armand, MUHIMPUNDU Lambert na BIGIRIMANA Nicolas. Hariho abandi benshi tuzi bagenda barabundabunda bayovya abantu ngo nibo “DAWIDI”. Ivyo vyose vyerekana abantu bakubagugwa n’impwemu zihumanye. Abantu bazomenya uwo Imana yatoranije umunsi yimye ingoma canke Uhoraho we nyene niwe amubahishuriye. Uwo muzokwumva yivuze ntimuhe agaciro. Abaciye mw’Ihanga Ryera bagasezererwa kubera vyabananiye kwezwa bagenda bararivuga nabi kubera ishari n’ubube gito ngo Imana yarivuyemwo. Umuntu wese n’asenge yisigurize Imana mwime amatwi ibikoresho vya wa mubi. Dukomeze gusengera abantu bose bazimiye.Uyu mwaka, Uhoraho Imana yatubariye yuko igikorwa yadutumye kiri ku musozo yuko igira ishitse ivyo yasezeranye. None turiko turasemerera akanyuma ngo uwutarezwa yezwe kuko igihe kirakuze. Ntihagire ushira umutima ku muntu n’umwe mugabo muwushire kuri Yesu Kristo wenyene, Amen!

title: Itangazo ry’Ihanga Ryera ry’Imana 777/2024
content:
Nkuko musanzwe mubizi Ihanga Ryera ry’Imana ni Ishengero rya Yesu Kristo  rikorera ku mugaragaro mu bihigu vyinshi vyo kw’isi. Mu gihugu c’Uburundi rishinze imizi mu ntara zose z’igihugu. Ahatari urusengero hari ibicaniro kandi niko bimeze no mu bindi bihugu vyo mu mahanga.

Hari ibicaniro mu bihugu vya Afrika , Amerika, Aziya, Canada, Ubulaya n’igihugu ca Australiya. Mu masengero no ku bicaniro ni mukomeze kwigishna kwihana neza, ukwezwa no gusenga.

Ahariho hose kw’isi, hariyo abo twabatije kandi tugomba yuko baramiriza mu gakiza. Uwo muzobona avuga canke ingendo yiwe idahuye n’iy’Abera muze mwihute mubitumenyeshe kugira ngo tubasengere kandi tubakanure. Twandikire kur’izo nomero z’abarongozi. Murakoze!

title: Uturanga 18 tw’abamalayika b’Imana
content:
UTURANGA  18 TW’ABAMARAYIKA

Duherutse kubabarira amazina y’abamarayika bakuru n’ivyo bajejwe gukorera abantu batumwe n’Uhoraho Imana. Ubu naho reka tubabarire ibintu 18 Bibiliya ivuga ku mu marayika ukwiriye kumenya kugira ngo wirinde gukora ikosa ni mwahura kuko bagiye kuza baraboneka cane mur’ibi bihe. Abamarayika bafise ikibanza abantu badakunda gutahura muri Bibiliya kandi banditswe incuro 300 uhereye mw’itanguriro gushika mu Vyahishuriwe Yohana. Baboneka nk’abatumwa, abadukingira, abaturwanira n’abama batazira Uhoraho Imana.

Abamarayika bavugwa nk’abera, ibiremwa biteye igomwe vy’umuco, bakorera umugambi w’ukugororoka kw’Imana. Ivyanditswe vyerekana yuko kubona umumarayika bidasanzwe kuko bishobora gutera ubgoba n’ukujugumira[Matayo 28:2-4, Abacamanza 6:22].Bivugwa yuko basa n’akabengebenge kitwa tarushishi, mu maso hasa n’umuravyo n’imuri z’umuriro, amaboko n’ibirenge vyiwe bisa n’umuringa w’umwakaka, kandi ijwi ry’amajambo rimeze nk’iry’ishengero ry’abantu[Daniyeli 10:6].

Bibiliya itubarira yuko Uhoraho Imana yaremye igitigiri c’abamarayika kidaharurika kuko kirengeye ivyiyumviro vy’abana b’abantu. Ubusumbasumbane bgabo buvugwa yuko ari amasinzi y’ingabo zizengurutse intebe y’inganji y’Imana. Ibiharuro vyabo bikaba imiliyaridi n’izindi n’ibihumbi n’ibihumbagiza[Abaheburayo 12:22, ivyahishuriwe Yohana 5:11].

Abamarayika baboneka muri Bibiliya nk’intumwa z’Imana, zitanga ubutumwa budasanzwe bgo kuyobora abantu[Luka 1:26-38, Itanguriro 16:7-11].Mu rurimi rw’ikigiriki, ijambo Marayika risigura umutumwa. Batwara intumbero y’Imana kandi bagashikiriza amabgirizwa yayo.

Mw’ijuru, abamarayika baguma bahimbaza kandi batazira Uhoraho Imana. Bazengurutse intebe y’inganji y’Uhoraho Imana baririmba indirimbo z’amashimwe.[Ivyahishuriwe Yohana 5:11-12, Yesaya 6:3].Baguma baha icubahiro Uhoraho Imana berekana ubutware n’ukugororoka kwiwe.

Hari igihe abamarayika bahabga amabanga n’Uhoraho Imana yo gukingira no gutabara Abera b’Imana kugira ngo ntibahure n’akabi[Zaburi 91:11-12, Daniyeli 6:22].Bashobora guseruka ku buryo buboneka mu gutabara, bagakingira kandi bagatanga intumbero ku bizera mu buryo butangaje.

Hari ibihe abamarayika bashira mu ngiro imanza z’Uhoraho Imana ku banyakibi no kubanyavyaha banse kw’ihana[Itanguriro 19:1-29, 2 Abami 19:35].Mur’ico gihe baba ibikoresho vyo guhana canke gusambura mu kwubahiriza amategeko y’Imana ku banyavyaha n’abagumutsi.

Naho abamarayika bafise ububasha kandi bejejwe, s’abo gusengwa. Ugusengwa n’ukwo Uhoraho Imana wenyene.[Ivyahishuriwe Yohana 22:8-9, Abikolosayi 2:18].N’iyo hagize uwugerageza kubasenga, bo nyene baramwiburiza bati usenge Uhoraho Imana wenyene, nayo jewe nd’umusavyi w’Imana nkawe. Iyo umuntu apfuye ntacika umumarayika, ni ikinyoma.

Bibiliya iratwereka yuko hariho ubutandukane hagati y’ubgoko bg’abamarayika bujana n’amabanga bajejwe nk’abamarayika bakuru n’abakerubi[Yuda 1:9, Ezekiyeli 10:1-22]. Bamwe baboneka bafise ubusumbasumbane n’ibikorwa bajejwe mu mabanga atandukanye y’ijuru.

Abamarayika ntibafise ubumenyi bg’ibintu vyose nk’Uhoraho Imana. Hariho n’ibintu usanga batazi[Matayo 24:36, 1 Petero 1:12].Ubumenyi n’ugutahura kwabo naho bazi vyinshi cane, kurafise aho Uhoraho Imana yakugarukirije.

Ivyanditswe vyinshi birerekana yuko abamarayika bakora nk’abarinzi canke abategeka amahanga. Baguma bayobora abantu muvyo bakora nk’uko babitumwe n’Uhoraho Imana[Daniyeli 10:13-21, 12:1].

Mw’ijuru, abamarayika baranezererwa abanyavyaha bihanye bagahindukirira Uhoraho Imana[Luke 15:10].Ugukizwa kw’umuntu wese kuzana umunezero no kunezererwa mu ngabo zo mw’ijuru nk’uko Imana ivyipfuza.

Umwami Yesu Kristo yaravuze yuko abamarayika batarongorana canke ngo barondoke.[Matthew 22:30].Ni ibinyabugingo vyo mu mpwemu atabushobozi bg’umubiri bgo kurongorana no kurondoka nk’uko abantu bameze. Tuzogaruka kur’iki dusigura [Itanguriro 6:1-4, na Yobu 1:6,2:1,38:7]kubiyumvirako bari abamarayika barongoye abantu.

Incuro nyinshi muri Bibiliya, abamarayika babonekeye abantu bafise ishusho y’abantu nyene. Rimwe na rimwe, abantu ntibashobora kubamenya yuko basanzwe ari abamarayika.[Abaheburayo 13:2, Itanguriro 18:1-3].Bashobora gufata ishusho y’umuntu kugira ngo bashobore kuyaga n’umuntu bamuha ubutumwa bg’ijuru.

Abamarayika bashobora kuba abagwanyi, abasirikare bagwanya inkomezi z’ababi. Bagwana mu buryo bg’umubiri no mu buryo bg’impwemu.[Ivyahishuriwe Yohana 12:7-9, 2 Abami 19:35]. Iyo bari mu ntambara y’impwemu barashobora no gushira mu ngiro urubanza rw’Imana no gukingira Abera.

Abamarayika baboneka bariko baratanga ubuhanuzi bg’Imana ku bantu. Nibo bavuga ibigiye gushika n’umugambi w’Imana.[Daniyeli 9:20-23, Zekariya 1:9]. Barashobora no gusigura inyereko bakanerekana uko umugambi w’Imana uriko urashitswa.

Mu gihe gikenewe, abamarayika haraho barungikwa gufasha abantu canke kubahumuriza.[Abaheburayo 1:14, Ivyakozwe n’Intumwa 12:5-11].Bashobora kwerekereza aba-Kristo no kubaremesha mu kibanza c’Imana.

Umumarayika ntashobora kuba mu bibanza vyinshi icarimwe nk’uko Uhoraho Imana ameze.[Daniyeli 9:21-23].Naho bashobora kwiyunguruza ku buryo bg’igitangaza kandi bagashika aho umuntu atiyumvira, aho bari haramenyekana.

Abamarayika ni ibiremwa vy’Imana, si nk’Uhoraho kuko bafise intango.[Abikolosayi 1:16, Nehemiya 9:6].Naho babayeho imbere y’abantu, ni ibiremwa.

Wiyumvira yuko woba warabonye umumarayika? Twandikire tubiyage.

title: Abarundi mumenye ivyerekeye abamarayika b’Imana kuko mugiye kubabona kenshi mu gihugu
content:
ABAMALAYIKA BAKOMEYE BAKORANA N’ABANTUHariho abamalayika bavugwa cane muri Bibiliya no mu bindi bitabo mugabo amadini n’amashengero menshi abaziko ibintu bike cane. Abamalayika ni ivyaremwe biba mw’ijuru. Bamwe baboneka bafise amababa abandi basa nk’abantu nkatwe, baza kudufasha no kutwerekeza batumwe n’Uhoraho Imana. Umwe wese muribo afise ico ajejwe n’ibikorwa adukorera nk’uko bafise n’ivyo bakora mw’ijuru. Abo batumwa b’Imana ntitubategeka kandi ntitubasenga mugabo dushobora kuyaga nabo iyo batuganirije. Umuntu wese arakwiriye kumenya ivyerekeye abamalayika kuko hari n’igihe Uhoraho Imana aza mw’ishusho y’umumalayika nk’igihihe ca Aburahamu [Itanguriro 18:1-33], Hagayi [Itanguriro 16:7-11], Mose [Kuvayo 3:2], ikoraniro ry’Abisirayeli [Abacamaza 1:2], Gidiyoni [Abacamanza 6:12] n’abandi.UMUMALAYIKA MURINZI WAWEUmuntu wese akijijwe arafise Malayika murinzi wiwe ajejwe ku mukuza muvyo impwemu. Agendana nawe kugira ngo akurinde, agutumbereze mu nzira nziza kandi agufashe mu gakiza. Uwo mu malayika uhabga akorana nawe gusa akaba yuzuye urukundo n’ukwihangana kandi akama hafi yawe. Ntaguhata canke ngo yisuke muvyo ubuzima bgawe kiretse umukundiye. Ariko iyo ugira wicwe igihe cawe co gutaha kitaragera, hari igihe yihutira kugukingira. Kenshi uri mu nzira wenyene uriko aratambuka hariho n’igihe umwikanga ukaraba inyuma nk’uko hari umuntu agukurikiye. [Ivyakozwe n’Intumwa 12:15]MALAYIKA MUKURU AZRAELNi malayika w’urupfu. Mu bisanzwe akora akazi ko gutandukanya umubiri n’ubugingo. Niwe yakira abapfuye ako kanya mw’iparadizo. Aravugwa cane mu vyanditswe vyera yuko ari malayika murimbuzi. Muri [2 Samweli 24:15-16] avugwa yuko ari Malayika ageseza abantu. Muri [2 Ingoma 21:15], uwo mu malayika w’Uhoraho yabonywe na Dawidi ari hagati y’ijuru n’isi, abanguriye inkota abansi b’Ihanga ry’Imana. Muri [Yesaya 37:36] uwo mu malayika w’Uhoraho yururutse mw’ijoro yica abasirikare 185.000, abantu bavyutse mugitondo basanze ari imirambikango. Uwo niwe yakubise urushi Herodi aturika inyo [Ivyakozwe n’intumwa 12:23], yishe Ananiya na Safira [Ivyakozwe n’Intumwa 5:1-25] n’abandi benshi kuko n’uyu munsi arakora.UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU CHAMUELIzina ryiwe risobanura “Uwubona Uhoraho Imana wenyene” Uwo niwe agushoboza gutsinda ibihe bigoye vy’imibabaro, ibibabaza umutima kandi ni nawe agufasha kumenya umufasha wawe wo mu mubiri. Ni umumalayikaw’amahoro n’urukundo, imbabazi n’ituze. [Zaburi 23:1-6]Page2

UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU GABRIELIzina ryiwe risigura “Imana niyo nkomezi zanje” Uwo azwi yuko ariwe yazaniye Mariya na Yozefu ubutumwa bg’ivuka rya Yesu Kristo. Azwi n’umumalayika mukuru azanira abantu ubutumwa bg’ijuru kandi niwe atunganiriza ingo n’imiryango. [Luka 1:26-38]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU HANIELIzina ryiwe risigura “Ubuntu bg’Imana”. Uwo niwe akurikirana abantu mu buzima bgabo kugira ngo baroranirwe bagire amahoro mu buzima. Niwe atuma ukura mu ngabire yawe yo kubona kure. Bivugwa yuko ariwe afise impfunguzo z’ibirimba vy’ijuru. Ni nawe yatwaye Enoki na Eliya mw’ijuru badaciye mu rupfu. [Itanguriro 5:24]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU JEREMIEL, JERAHAMEELIzina ryiwe risigura “Imbabazi z’Imana” Igihe wumva ufise ivyo wiyagiriza canke ugomba kugira intumbero nshasha niwe aza kugukorera. Ni umumalayika w’umunezero n’ubushobozi bgo kubabarira kandi niwe atanga inzozi n’inyereko. [Yoweli 2:28-32]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU JOPHIELIzina ryiwe risigura “Ubgiza bg’Imana” Niwe aramira abantu mu bihe bigoye akanigiza kure ivyiyumviro bibi. Yitwa malayika w’ubgenge n’ukubonekerwa, akanitwa malayika wo mw’ijuru ry’indwi. Ni nawe yaje kwirukana Adamu na Eva mu murima wa Edeni kandi niwe yagarutse gufata umutima wa Yesu Kristo i Gitsemane agira ababazwe. [ Iyahishuriwe Yohana 2:3-4]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU MICHAELIzina ryiwe risigura “Wa wundi asa n’Imana” Azwi nk’umurinzi n’umurwana ntambara. Niwe yirukana ubgoba n’ivyiyumviro bidutera kwiganyira mu buzima bgacu.Niumukuruw’ingabozirwanamuMpwemunomumubiri. [Daniyeli10:21, Yuda 1:9]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU RAGUELIzina ryiwe risigura “Umugenzi w’Imana” niwe asuzuma yuko umumalayika wese arangura amabanga yiwe neza. Araza akaguhanura ico wokora mu bihe bigoye uba uriko uracamwo. Ni umumalayika w’ubutungane n’ubusabane bg’Imana n’abantu. Umuravye uko avugwa ni Yesu Kristo. [Ivyahishuriwe yohana 1:4-8]MALAYIKA MUKURU RAPHAELPage3

Izina ryiwe risigura “Imana irakiza” Niwe atumwa kuzana ugukira kw’abagwaye mu buryo bg’ibitangaza. Niwe yahora aza ku kidengeri ci Betesida akazikurura amazi maze abayitayemwo bagakira. [Yohana 5:1-4]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU SANDALPHONIzina ryiwe risigura “umuvukanyi” bakavuga yuko ameze nk’ihasa rya Malayika Metatron (mu Malayika atahura cane ubuzima bg’ababa mw’isi n’ingorane bagira kuko yarayibayemwo imbere yuko aja kuba mw’ijuru. Ni umumalayika w’inkomezi) kuko nawe akora igikorwa co gutwara amasengesho y’abantu mw’ijuru kugira ngo abadayimoni ntibayatangire. Niwe atwara n’amasezerano abantu bagirira Uhoraho Imana akayashikana. Azwi kandi nk’umumalayika w’umuziki n’indirimbo mw’ijuru akaba ari nawe afasha abaririmbira Imana kw’isi. Niwe avugwa mu nyereko zo muri [Zaburi 34:7]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU URIEL (ARIEL)Izina ryiwe risigura “Umuco w’Imana” rikongera rigasigura “Intare y’Imana”. Niwe mu bihe bigoye, igihe umuntu atazi ico akwiriye gukora araza akakwigisha, akakwereka inzira, akanakwereka ingene ubisohokamwo. Bavuga yuko atunganiriza n’ibikoko n’ibindi vyaremwe n’Imana vyose. Ni umumalayika w’ubgenge, umuco n’ukuri kw’Imana. Niwe mu malayika bavuga yuko arinze n’amarembo y’ijuru. Hari n’abibaza yuko yoba ari umwigeme. N’uyo yamuritse Intumwa Pawulo hanyuma akumva ijwi rya Yesu Kristo. [Ivyakozwe n’intumwa 9:9, 22:6-11]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU ZADKIELIzina ryiwe risigura “Ukugororoka kw’Imana” Ni umumalayika afise ubushobozi budasanzwe. Niwe azwi nk’umunyempuhwe n’imbabazi kandi azana ihumure mu bihe bitoroshe. Niwe yasemereye abuza Aburahamu ngo ntatange umuhungu wiwe Isaka. [Itanguriro 22:1-19]Ni ivyingenzi gutahura ubushobozi, ububashan’umugambi idufitiye mu kuturungikira abamalayika kubgo ubushobozi bga Mpwemu Yera. Abantu benshi baritiranya ibikorwa vy’abamalayika n’ivya Mpwemu w’Imana. Abamalayika ni intumwa z’Imana ziza gukora ibitangaje hano mu bantu ariko Mpwemu w’Imana ni Uhoraho Imana, ni Yesu Kristo we nyene abana natwe mu buryo bga Mpwemu Yera.Woba wibaza yuko umaze kubona umumalayika canke umaze kwumva ijwi ryiwe? title: Imyaka 25 Imana itwemeje yuko isezerano ari iryacu n’imyaka 10 tumaze turyigisha.
content: MYAKA 25 IRARUMANYE UHORAHO ADUTUMYE GUTERAMIRA ISEZERANOBarundi Barundikazi, imyaka 25 iruzuye Uhoraho Imana aduhishuriye yuko isezerano yasezeraniye ihanga ry’Abarundi ari iryacu n’inzunganwe zizokurikira. Imyaka 10 nayo irarangiye Uhoraho adutumye kuryemanga, kuryigisha no kuritangariza abantu bose. Nkuko ihanga rya Isirayeli ryagendana n’Uhoraho ari mu gicu, mu nkingi y’umuriro n’ahari isandugu y’isezerano, uyu munsi twebge Ihanga Ryera ry’Imana tugendana n’Uhoraho Imana mu kugera ikirenge muca Yesu Kristo n’intumwa ziwe. Mpwemu Yera akaturongora mu kuvugana natwe.Kuva Uhoraho aduhishuriye yuko isezerano ari iryacu, akanadutuma kuritangariza bose, tuguma dutera akamo Abarundi n’abanyamahanga bose ngo bihane, bezwe kugira ngo bashitsweko ivyo Uhoraho Imana yasezeranye. Mugukora ivyo twifashisha ukwandika ibitabo, ivugabutumwa, gutangaza imburi n’ubuhanuzi ku maradiyo, ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi, amashengero n’ibicaniro, n’umunwa ku wundi kugira ngo umugambi w’Imana uranguke. [Matayo 10:32]Muri rusangi, Abarundi twatanguye kwumva yuko twatoranijwe n’Uhoraho Imana ngo tube Ihanga Ryera mu mwaka wi 1935, aho umuvugabutumwa w’umusuwedi yitwa URI yaje mu Burundi mu bikorwa vy’aba misiyonari. Uwo muvugabutumwa yaseruye muri uwo mwaka yuko yeretswe umuco ukoroka uvuye mw’ijuru ugakorokera mu gihugu c’Uburundi maze ugakwira isi yose. Muri Myandagaro mu mwaka 1968, mu gikorane ca Pentekoti cabereye i Mugara, habayemwo ubuvugishwa bwinshi buvuga yuko Abarundi ari ihanga ryatoranijwe n’Imana nk’uko na Isirayeli yari yaratoranijwe. Ubwo buvugishwa bgahamagarira abantu bose kwihana, kwiyeza no kwintunganya bakoresheje kwisonzesha no gusenga cane.Mu myaka yakurikiye ubwicanyi bgo mu 1972, impunzi iyo zahungiye zaciye zitangura gusenga cane kubera ibihe bigoye zarimwo gushika naho hatangura kwururuka ubuvugishwa. Isezerano ku gihugu c’Uburundi ritangura kuvugishwako hirya no hino muri Tanzaniya, Congo, n’Urwanda. N’Abarundi basigaye mu gihugu bararose inzozi, barerekwa kandi baravugishwa ku vyerekeye umuvyuro n’ikanguro bizotangurira mu Burundi hanyuma bigakwira isi yose.Kugira ngo Uhoraho Imana yerekane kandi yemeze umugambi wayo ku Barundi, yarakoresheje n’abanyamahanga baturuka mu bihugu bibanyi mbere no mu bihugu vya kure nka bulaya na Amerika. Rehinard Bonnke yagize iyerekwa ku Burundi ati: « Mbonye umuriro ukoroka uvuye mw’ijuru urandagata Uburundi bwose hanyuma uca ukwira isi yose. » Aho yavuga ubushobozi bw’umuvyuro n’ikanguro bw’ururutse buva mw’ijuru. Hari n’abandi benshi beretswe ivy’amasezerano ku gihugu c’Uburundi. Ayo masezerano rero agira ashike ku gihugu vuba ni muyitegurire, niko Mpwemu w’Imana avuga hirya no hino, Amen!

title: Imana ntirobanura ku butoni: Iruzuza Mpwemu Yera abakora ivyo kugororoka vyose.
content:
« Petero yanzika kuvuga, ati N’ukuri ni ho nkimenya yukw Imana itarobanura abantu ku butoni, ariko mu mahanga yose uyubaha, agakora ivy’ ukugororoka, iramwemera. »[Ivyakozwe n’intumwa 10:34-35]

Ico twomenya n’uko Imana abantu bose irabemera nk’abo yaremye, kuko irabazi. Ariko hari abo yemera ifatiye kubirenze ivyo, bitewe n’ubucuti bafitanye nayo, kurya no mubuzima har’abo twemera ko ari abagenzi b’inkoramutima.

Kimwe mubintu vyerekana ko Imana yakwemeye, n’uko iguha kuri Mpwemu wayo(Mpwemu Yera).« Ivyako.n’intumwa 5:32,Yohana 14:15-16″.

Kubatizwa muri Mpwemu Yera rero ni ikimenyetso cerekana ko yakwemeye. Ico gihe uhabwa ubushobozi butuma witahura, bukagufasha guhinduka, gukora ivy’ Imana ishaka.

Aha niho benshi vyankira,kuko bashaka gukora ivy’ Imana ishaka atabushobozi bararonka.Ntivyokunda, bisa no kugomba gutwara imodoka inywa igitoro kandi atakirimwo.

Kugira umuntu aronke Mpwemu Yera rero, bitegwa n’ikibanza yabihaye mumutima, Imana iri mw’ ijuru ikabona koko ko uyo muntu abikeneye,yamaramaje kuyikurikira. Ico gihe ahabwa ubushobozi bwa Mpwemu Yera.

Kubona abigishwa bamaze imisi cumi basenga, barindiriye isezerano rya Mpwemu Yesu amaze gusibira mw’ijuru ,n’ikimenyetso c’uko umuntu akwiye kurondera Imana n’umwete,kugira ngo ahabwe ubushobozi bwa Mpwemu Yera.

Sinobabesha, umuntu adafise ubwo bushobozi, ahinduka umunyedini,umuntu akora ivy’ imagenzo,ivyo mubwenge, kandi n’ivy’ agakiza ntabinezerererwa.Kubera iki?:

N’uko no mugakiza naho hari intambara. Umuntu aba akeneye kuremeshwa n’uwo Mpwemu.No kugira umuntu yemere kuzira ivyo yizera, bisaba gushobozwa.

Intumwa zimaze guhabwa Mpwemu,zarashize amanga, ziva aho zari zinyegeje zivugira Yesu zidatinya no gupfa. Aha nimugihe iyo atabushobozi dutinya ivyo batuvuga kubwa Yesu.

Umuntu yahawe Mpwemu atangura kubabazwa n’abari muvyaha,kuko yumva muri we ko bazorimbuka,nibatahinduka,bikamusunikira kubabwira ubutumwa. Aha ni mugihe iyo atabushobozi umuntu yisanga akunda isi,ivyaha biyirimwo akumva ntaco bimubwiye.Ata Mpwemu yera, n’ubukristo ntagisobanuro bwoba bufise.

Dukwiye kuronderana umwete guhabwa Mpwemu Yera,niwe azodushoboza gukora ivy’Imana ishaka, tukarangiza ubuzima bwacu twakoze ico twaremewe.

title: Ukuri: Edeni yari hehe? Ubgato bga Nowa babutoye hehe?
content: IREMWA RY’ISI N’ABANTU, UMURIMA WA EDENI N’UBGATO BGA NOWAAbahinga n’abashakashatsi bo kw’isi barashoboye guhuza urukurikirine rwivyabaye kw’isi nkukobidondwa muri Bibiliya n’urukurikirane rw’ingene ubuhinga bg’isi bgagiye buratera imbere nk’uko kahise kavyerekana gushika uyu munsi. Nta kintu na kimwe cerekana yuko ivyanditswe muri Bibiliya vyoba atari ukuri canke bitabaye uko vyanditswe.Barashoboye kumenya imyaka ibintu vyose vyabereyeko kuva mu mwaka wi 2500 YKA (Yesu Kristo Ataravuka) aho abanyegiputa bavumbura ubuhinga bgo gukora impapuro (Papyrus) zokwandikako n’irangi ryo kwandikisha bagaca bashiraho amasomero. Ni mur’ico gihe nyene bataguye gukoresha ibintu bikozwe mu vyuma. Mu buzima bg’abantu bavugwa muri Bibiliya, abahinga bamenye igihe Aburahamu yavukiye mu mwaka wi 2166 (YKA), igihe yinjiriye muri Kanani mu 1091, ukuvuka kwa Isaka 2066 (YKA), ukuvuka kwa Yakobo na Isawo mu 2006 (YKA)kuduga gushika mu mwaka wa 95 (YKY= Yesu Kristo Yaravutse).Mu bahinga n’abashakashatsi b’ubumenyi bgo mw’isi no mu vyanditse, nta n’umwe yashoboye kumenya umwaka isi yaremewe, igihe umuntu yaremewe n’igihe Nowa yabaziyeko ubgato. Ico abantu bose bazi nuko Mose yoba yavutse hagati y’Umwaka wa 1304 na 1237 YKA, akandika igitabo c’ITANGURIRO hagati y’imyaka ya 1450 na 1410 YKA. Ico gitabo nico cerekana (1) Iremwa ry’isi [Itanguriro 1:1-2:3], (2) Ivyerekeye umurima wa Edeni, Adamu na Eva, Kayini na Abeli, n’uruvyaro rwa Adamu [Itanguriro 2:4-5:32], (3) Ivyerekeye ubgato bga Nowa, Umwuzure, ingene abantu basubiye kwuzura isi n’ivyerekeye umunara wi Babeli [Itanguriro 6:1-11:32].Nk’uko vyanditse muri Bibiliya, biboneka yuko Edeni yahera haruguru mu kigobe ca Perse igashika hepfo muri Mezopotamiya aho inzuzi za Tigris (Pishoni, Gihoni na Hiddekeli) hamwe na Epfrate (Phirati) zisukira mu nyaja. [Itanguriro 2:8-14] Biraboneka kandi yuko Nowa yabaye ahahora Edeni. Abahinga n’abashakashatsi basanze ubgato bga Nowa buri mu gihugu ca Turikiya ku musozi Ararate bakemeza yuko ivya Nowa vyabaye mu imyaka 5500 ni 3000 YKA mu gihe abashakashatsi bavuga yuko Igitabo c’Itanguriro kidonda ivyabaye hagati y’imyaka 8000 na 6000 gushika mu 2000 YKA.Muri Bibiliya niho abaremwe bose bamenyera ingene isi yaremwe, aho Edeni yariri n’uko ivy’umwuzure wa Nowa vyagenze. Ubuhinga n’ubushakashatsi buhambaye nabgo nyene buza bushingira intahe yuko ivyanditswe muri Bibiliya ari ukuri kwuzuye. Ivyo ntibibuza yuko habaho abantu bivugira ivyo bibaza canke kubera urukundo bakunda igihugu cabo bavuga yuko Edeni yari iwabo. Edeni yabaye muri Afrika canke ikaba i Bulaya nico kimwe, ico twomenya n’uko twogororoka kugira ngo tuzoragwe ubuzima budashira muri Yesu Kristo.

title: Korera mu ngabire wahawe nta muruho uzogira mu kubaho kwawe.
content:
KORESHA INGABIRE YAWE.

« Petero aramubarira at’ Ifeza n’izahabu nta vyo mfise, arikw ico mfise ndakiguha: mw izina rya Yesu Kristo Umunyanazareti, va hasi utambuke. »[Ivyakozwe n’intumwa 3:6]

Aha yar’umuntu amugaye yamenyereye asegerereza, abonye Petero na Yohana aca abashurak’umutima yibaza ngo har’ico bari bumuhe. Petero niko kumubwira ko atafeza n’izahabu afise. Ariko aca akoresha ingabire yar’asanganywe,aramukiza mw’izina rya Yesu.

Mw’ishengero rya Kristo, ingabire za Mpwemu zifise igikorwa gikomeye amafaranga atoshobora gukora. Nivyo,amafaranga acemura vyinshi, harimwo kugura ibikoresho biba bikenewe,…, ariko burya ingabire nizo zituma ibintu biba vyiza kurusha.

Benshi biyumva ko bariko bakorera mungabire zabo ar’uko baririmba,bavug’ubutumwa,baprotokola, ariko burya ingabire ziruzuye, zitagira abazikoreramwo.

Umuntu ashobora kuja gusengera ahantu batamuzi, agataha atan’uwumuramukije ngo amubaze iyo yaje ava. Akahasengera nk’ukwezi kurenga atawumumenye, kandi abakristo b’abasangwa buzuye urusengero. Wibaze!

Har’abobitangira insiguro ngo n’uko haba hasengera benshi, ariko sivyo. Kuko abo benshi nibo bokwakirana igishika abo bake, bakabaza amakuru yabo. Ariko abatari bake umwe wese aba ababaye ivyiwe. Bituma umuntu mushasha aje kwakira kristo aba inyakamwe,akamenyana na pasitori n’abandi bake, nabo batamufitiye umwanya uhagije kubw’amabanga menshi baba bajejwe. Ntagitangaje rero ko atokomera mugakiza, kiretse aronse abamuboneye izuba yigirako,bamuganiriza bakanamukomeza.

Benedata, kwakira abashitsi n’ingabire ikomeye. S’ukubakira ng’ubazimane, ahubwo n’ugutuma bumva ko bisanze. Kandi ivyo si ibango risaba ko uba warasengewe,n’igikorwa c’uwariwe wese iyo ari kurusengero iwabo. Petero ati « ifeza n’izahabu ntavyo mfise,ariko ico mfise ndakiguha,… »

Natwe dukwiye gukoresha ivyo dufise Imana yaduhaye. Nimba yaraduhaye amafeza, nayo tuyakoreshe no mumurimo wayo. Nimba atamafeza dufise,dukoreshe ubundi buryo yaduhaye,ingabire zacu, inguvu zacu,ubwenge bwacu…

Ishengero rya Kristo ryorushiriza gukomera, mugihe abaribarizwamwo bose bakoresha ingabire Imana yabahaye, ntihabemwo ba sindabizwa.

Mukazi ka misi yose abantu bakorera muri leta canke mu mashirahamwe bama mu ndyane bamwe bagahanwa abandi bakirukanwa Kubera yuko badakorera mu ngabire zabo. Bamwe bize ivyo badakunda abandi baronkejwe akazi kugira ngo baronke uko babaho gusa mugabo ata ngabire babifisemwe. Ivyo vyama bibatera ibibazo iminsi yose. Iyo umuntu akora akazi akoresha ingabire yiwe, ntavunika, nta mategeko amuremera kandi nta muntu n’umwe amuca imbere ngo amurushe kubikora neza iyo atari ingabire zisumbana. Umuntu wese n’arabe igisata kirimwo ingabire ziwe abe arico akoreramwo, umuyangayanga akorera ku macuniro areke kwigira umuganga avura abantu mu bitaro. Amen!

title: Uwakoranye na satani yaribiye amabanga ahambaye abera: Soma
Mube ivyitegererezo vyiza aho mubaye mu gukorera Imana musengera amasezerano.
content:
Hana yabaye icitegererezo kandi yatanze akarorero keza.

« Maze Hana asenga Uhoraho afise intuntu, arira cane, asezerana isezerano, at’ Ewe Uhoraho Nyen’ ingabo, ni waraba umubabaro wanje incoreke yawe, ukanyibuka, ntunyibagire jewe incoreke yawe, ukantabaza umwana w’umuhungu, nanje nzomuguha, Uhoraho, abe uwawe kuzorinda apfa, kandi nta rupfuhe ruzomugera ku mutwe. »[1 Samweli 1:10-11]

Uyu mupfasoni Hana ni umwe muturorero twiza turi muri bibiliya. Yaraciye mukigeragezo co kubura uruvyaro, kandi agisokamwo amahoro Imana imutabaye. Reka turabe bimwe muvyo twomwigirako mukigeragezo ciwe, twoshira mu bikorwa natwe mu bikomeye twocamwo ivy’arivyo vyose:

1.Hana yarasenga:

Buri mwaka, yama yaduze aja mungoro y’Uhoraho kumushikanira ikimazi. Ninaho yaje gutura isengesho asaba akana, Imana yumva ugusenga kwiwe, iramwishura.Abizera dukwiye kuba turi abantu basenga, uko vyoba bimeze kwose. Ntidukwiye kurambirwa canke kubireka, kuko Imana irishura amasengesho ititaye kugihe kihaciye.

2.Hana yarakorera Imana.

Yama yaduze buri mwaka kuyitangira ikimazi. Ninako mukigeragezo dukwiye guhora dukorera Imana, uko dushobojwe. Gukorera Imana kwacu ntikukagenwe n’ibihe, ahubwo bikwiye guhinduka umuco wacu, twaba turi mubihe vyiza canke bibi,kuko Imana iguma ar’Imana.

3.Hana yarihangana:

Yar’afise mukeba wiwe Penina, yahora amurya umutima kuko atavyara, ariko Penina we akaba yaravyara.

Benedata,ukwihangana kw’umuntu kurageragezwa,uko yoba ari kwose. Imana iy’iretse abantu bakatugerageza,dukwiye kwihangana gushika twishuwe. Abantu bafise igihe co kukugerageza,iyo wihanganye Imana irakora ibikwiye ikagukura mugasuzuguro.

3.Hana yagize inyifato nziza imbere y’umukozi w’Imana.

Umuherezi Eli yamubonye arira ijwi ridasohoka,aca yibaza ngo yaborewe,aranabimubwira, ariko Hana yamwishuye neza ati nd’umuntu yabonye amahano;nariko ndasuka amajojwa yanje imbere y’Uhoraho, ntavino nanyoye.1sam1:15.

Sivyiza rero kubona umukozi w’Imana nabi n’ubwo yoba atagutahuye mukibazo urimwo. Ukwiye kubimusobanurira n’uburwaneza,ntazoreka kugugesha umugisha,niyo atowuguhesha,Imana yo izowuguha. Rero Hana niko yabigenje,ku w’inyifato nziza imbere y’umukozi w’Imana Eli, yaciy’ amuhesha umugisha,ati Ni wigire amahoro; Imana ya isirayeli iguhe ico wayisavye. Kandi niko vyagenze,bidatevye Hana yaciye yibungenga.

Hana yari gushobora kwidodombera Eli umukozi w’Imana, ariko yahisemwo kugira inyifato nziza imbere yiwe.

Hari abantu bihanganira ikigeragezo,ariko bakihangana bagira inyifato itari nziza(bakidodomba,bakavuga nabi,…), mbere no gukorera Imana abatabivuyemwo bakagabanukirwa cane. Ariko siko bikwiye kumera.

Dukwiye kwigira kuri Hana.Yarasenga,agakorera Imana,akihangana,kandi akagira inyifato nziza.Iy’umukristo avyifashemwo nk’uko, asohoka mukigeragezo ciwe afise intahe nziza mumutima wiwe, kandi aba afise n’ivyo yosangiza abandi vyo kubafasha; ikirenzeko,kubwo gusenga kwiwe,abona Imana imwiyereka mukumuha inkomezi,nomukumukura muvyo yabona bisa n’ibidashoboka.

title: Tube abantu b’ubgenge aho turi hose tudatinya gukora ivyiza.
content:
TWAME DUKORA IVYIZA.

« Twame dukora ivyiza, ntiducobogore, kukw igihe ni cashika tuzokwimbura, ni tutarambirwa. »[Ab’i Galatiya 6:9]

Gukora ivyiza biri muvyo umuntu wese yahuye na Yesu ahamagariwe. Kandi ntibiba ngombwa ko yirirwa arabisunikirwamwo kuko Yesu ari mumutima niwe abimuha kuvyiyumvamwo.Nico gituma uwamenye Imana arushiriza kunezerwa vyuzuye iyo ariko ivyiza.

N’ubwo kwikunda biri muri kamere ya buri muntu wese, ariko sivyo bitanga umunezero,mugihe umuntu atitaho ivy’abandi. Ahubwokugaragariza urukundo abandi nivyo bituma umuntu yiyumva neza kurusha .

Kandi buriya iyo umuntu akoze iciza aba abivye mw’isi y’impwemu, kandi akazokwimbura. Nico gituma bibiliya ivuga ko gutanga bizana umugisha, kuruta guhabwa.

Ariko rero, hari ababiba neza kurusha abandi. Nk’akarorero,umwe ashobora gukoresha udufaranga twiwe ashigikira impfuvyi, uwundi akadukoresha asororera abandi ngo babe barishimisha. Bose baba basohoye uburyo bwabo,ariko hari uwuba yabivye neza kurusha uwundi. Kwishimisha si icaha bitewe n’uburyo umuntu abikozemwo, ariko ivyo ntivyokora kumutima w’Imana ngo bitume iguhesha umugisha,nk’uwagiye kuraba impfuvyi, abarwaye,…

Dukwiye kumenya aho tubiba n’ingene tubiba. Cane cane tukama twibuka ko ari ivyo twahamagariwe.

Ikindi twomenya, n’uko iyo ubivye udaca wimbura ako kanya nyene. Ahubwo bifata igihe,ukanabagarira ivyo wabivye,hanyuma ukazokwimbura.

Benedata, hagati yo kubiba no kwimbura,hakwiye kubaho kutarambirwa. Imana izohesha umugisha ibikorwa vyiza vy’amaboko yawe, ariko izobikora igihe co kwimbura kigeze.

Igihe kizogera Imana ikoreshe amaboko y’abandi mukuguha ivyiza, nk’uko nawe yakoresheje ayawe muguhesha abandi ivyiza. Kandi iyo umuntu yimbura, asarura vyinshi ugereranije n’ivyo yabivye.

« Twame dukora ivyiza rero, ntiducobogore, kuko igihe nicashika tuzokwimbura,nitutarambirwa ».

Muhezagirwe.
