title: Uku kwezi uzozirikane ivyo Uhoraho yatubariye
Umugororotsi azomererwa neza no mubihe abandi batari bavyiteze.
content:
UMUGOROROTSI AZOMERERWA NEZA.

« Mubgire umugororotsi kw azomererwa neza, kukw azotungwa n’ivyo ibikorwa vyiwe vyamuje. »[Yesaya 3:10]

Mw’isi yose, abantu batinya Imana irabishimira. Bibiliya ivuga ngo abera bo mw’isi nizo ntore nezerererwa. Ahandi naho ati inyonga z’Uhoraho ziri kubagororotsi. Muyindi mvugo,isi,ibintu,…ntagaciro bifise mumaso y’Imana, vyose n’ivyacu.

Umugororotsi azomererwa neza rero. Kumererwa neza Imana ivuga,si ugutunga vyinshi, ahubwo n’ukugira akaneza ko mumutima, ukanezerererwa ubuzima kubw’Imana wamenye.

Iyo ugerageza gukora ivyo Uhoraho ashaka,aguha kunyurwa,amahoro,Umunezero,…Satani rero akora ibishoboka vyose, ngo yibagize abizera Imana isoko y’umunezero wabo, mukubereka ivyo bakenye. Gutyo akabanyaga amahoro.

Nimba ibifadika arivyo soko y’umunezero wacu, abizera ba mbere babayeho batishimye, kuko bo bagurishije ivyabo, umwe wese agahabwa ico akenye, hanyuma hagatera guhamwa, bamwe bakangazwa abandi bakicwa.Ariko, kuri bo Imana bizeye yababereye vyose, babaho banezerewe,banyuzwe, bishimiye agakiza bakiriye, bari bamerewe neza mumutima kubw’ Imana yabo.

Imana rero izoguha kumererwa neza mumutima, ubihawe n’ubuntu bwayo, ariko kandi kuko ari Imana yitwararika abayo, izoguhezagira bivanye n’uko ibona ko ari vyiza kuri wewe, bigutere intege zo kubandanya kuyikorera.« Umugororotsi azomererwa neza ».

title: Ibanga rihambaye: Uwizera wese akwiriye kugira ubgenge.
content: IBANGA UWIZERA WESE AKWIRIYE KUMENYAUmwansi wa mbere w’abizera Imana si satani n’abadayimoni nkuko vyigishwa mu mashengero. Umwansi wa mbere arembeje aba-Kristo bari mw’isi ni ukutamenya ububasha n’ubushobozi bahawe, no kudakoresha ingabire zabo. Abantu benshi birigwa bariganyira ngo nti bize amashure canke ngo ntaco bahawe bakibagira yuko ahubgo aribo bafise muribo ivyo abandi bose bakeneye. Burya agakiza kuzuye gatanga amahoro atagira akagero.

title: Abanyamasezerano bose basabga kwiyeza no kwiyambura umururazi ku magenekerezo ya 28 na 29/02/2024
content: ABANYAMASEZERANO BOSE BASABGE KWEZWA N’UKWIKURA UMURURAZIUmukozi w’Imana wo mu Ntara ya Rumonge yatumwe ku banyamasezerano bose ngo mur’iyi minsi ibiri irangiza ukwezi kwa kabiri 28-29/02; mwese mwiyeze kandi mwitunganye cane mu kwiyambura umururazi uri mu mitima kugira ngo ntimupfe ahubgo mushikire amasezerano murindiranye igishika.Uwundi mukozi w’Imana wo mu ntara ya Bujumbura yavugishijwe yuko abantu mwese murindiriye amasezerano Imana yahaye igihugu c’Uburundi musabge gufata iminsi 28-29/02, ibe iminsi yo kuduga umusozi wo kwezwa no gutunganya kuko imbere hari ibikomeye.Ukwiyeza n’inzira umuntu atangura kandi akabandanya mu gukurikira Yesu Kristo. Ni uguhinduka mu vyiyumviro, mu mbono y’ibintu, mu ntumbero, mu mvugo no mu ngiro. Ukwezwa gutangura iyo twaturiraniye ivyaha vyacu vyose tugasaba imbabazi kuko bituma Uhoraho Imana aduharira kandi akatweza ibigabitanyo vyacu vyose. [1Yohana 1: 9]Umururazi uwumvira mu mutima wawe nta jambo uronka yo kuwusobanura. Umururazi umeze nk’inkota ikarishe, nk’umwampi usongoye, urura nk’umubirizi, ukababa nk’urwaga, ugasharira nk’ipilipili mu gisebe kandi ukababaza nk’ubumara mu mutima. Umururazi uterwa n’ishavu ryinshi, ishari n’inzigo, ubushangashirwe n’urwanko, ubukene n’ukwipfuza, ukurenganywa n’ukuvugwa nabi, uguhebga n’uguhemukirwa, ukutababarirwa n’ukutababarira. Ni ibibabaza umutima vyose. Abafise umururazi biremeshereza mu bushakanyi, uburake, igono, gusenga ibigirwamana, uburozi, ikeba, ibice, kuborerwa, urwanko, n’amacakubiri… Umuntu afise umururazi naho avuga yuko yubaha Imana yama afise ishavu, intuntu, yicura ikibi, yicurikira, avuga nabi canke akagira uburyarya, agira umutima udadaraye kandi arabishe kuyaga. Suzuma rero kiwe cose yuko atakitari muri wewe.Uhoraho Imana aratubarira uko dukira umururazi: “Mwiyambure umururazi wose no kujingitwa n’uburake no gutongana no gutukana bibavemwo, hamwe n’inzigo yose. Mugiriranire neza, mugiriranire imbabazi, muhariranire nkuko Imana yabahariye muri Kristo Yesu.” [Abanyefeso 4:31-32] Iyo umuntu yirukanye umururazi mu mutima wiwe, ujana n’ivyipfuzo vya kameremere k’umubiri. Mu muntu yihanye akiyambura umururazi, mu mutima wiwe haca hinjiramwo ivyamwa vya Mpwemu Yera: “Urukundo, umunezero, amahoro, ukwihangana, kugira neza, ingeso nziza, kuba umwizigirwa, uburwaneza” [Abigalatiya 5:22-23]Mur’iyi minsi ibiri yo kwiyeza no kwisomora umururazi, umuntu wese yisuzume arabe yuko afise ivyamwa vya Mpwemu Yera muri we.

title: Ugusenga kugira ngo Uhoraho yitoranirize.
content:
GUSENGERA AMAHITAMWO.

« Barasenga, bati Mwami, ni wewe uzi imitima y’abantu bose, none werekane uwo utoranije mur’ aba bompi »[Ivyakozwe n’intumwa 1:24]

Aha ni intumwa zariko zirasenga zisaba Imana izirongore muguhitamwo uwosubirira Yuda kuko yari yariyahuye inyuma yo kugurisha Yesu. Hagati ya Matiya na Yusito, bashaka umwe kuko niwe yar’akenewe ngw’amusubirire mugishingo. Basenze bavuga bati Mana, niwewe uzi imitima y’aba bantu bose,…

Burya uko umuntu akura, hari igihe bimusaba amahitamwo amwe n’amwe kandi akomeye, nko guhitamwo uwo muzobana, canke kubakozi b’Imana guhitamwo abo batoranya muguhagararira umurimo,guhitamwo incuti…

Isengesho rikwiriye, ni irivuga ngo Mana, ni wewe uzi imitima y’aba bantu. Muyindi mvugo,muguhitamwo,umuntu wakagomvye guhera kumutima w’umuntu. Kuko umutima w’uwundi utaba uwuzi ijana kw’ijana, niho usenga ngo Imana ikurongore.Ariko benshi bahera kubigaragarira amaso.

Umusi samweli Imana yamutuma kugenda kurobanuza amavuta uwuzoba umwami, yihenze kukaranga ka bakuru ba Dawidi, yibwira ko ari muri bo Imana yatoranije. Na se wa Dawidi nawe kuko yaraba ibigaragarira amaso, ataraba umutima, yabihenzeko, yibaza ko ari muri bo. Dawidi arirengagizwa, kandi ariwe yar’afise umutima Imana ishaka.

Imana yaje kubwira samweli ati…kuko jewe sindaba nk’uko abantu baraba, kuko jewe ndaba umutima.Vyarangiye uwufise umutima Imana ishaka(Dawidi) ariwe atoranijwe.

Benedata, ibindi vyose birihuta gutituka, uretse umutima gusa. Ntidukwiye kuraba dufatiye kubigaragara inyuma gusa, ngo biduhume amaso bitubuze kubaza Imana izi imitima y’abantu bose.

Imana izi imitima izokurongorera ahakwiriye, kandi ntuze wite cane kuvyo abantu baraba ibigaragarira amaso bavuga, nimba uzoba wasenze ukumva ko koko urongowe n’Imana.

Kandi amahitamwo ben’aya uzoyasanga mumice hafi yose y’ubuzima:Muguhitamwo abagenzi, canke uwo muzokwubakana,muguhitamwo akazi(mugihe ubona imiryango yugurutse ari myinshi),muguhitamwo abatoranywa mumurimo w’Imana,…

Mugihe c’amahitamwo, dukwiye kwirinda guhitamwo turabiye kubigaraga amaso gusa, kuko burya uko igihe kihaca umutima w’umuntu niyo shusho nziza yerekana ubwiza bwiwe. Igikuru n’umutima rero, ibindi umuntu yobiraba,ariko yahereye kumutima, agasenga kugira ngo Imana izi imitima y’abantu imurongore,kuko hatabayeho gusenga n’uwo mutima nyene umuntu yowihendako.

title: Nta kintu na kimwe cotuma wica abenegihugu ngo uriko uharanira agateka kawe.
content:
Umuhari Red Tabara waraye wihaye inkumbi hafi y’igisagara ca Bujumbura aho wishe umuryango wose uri mu kigandaro. Abarundi baratera igihugu cabo bakica benewabo ngo barondera ibiganiro na leta!

Abarundi baramenyereye kwumva amasasu n’ibisasu bisamirana ku mbibe z’igihugu maze bukeye bagasanga ni abenegihugu m: abana, abagore, abagabo abatama n’abatamakazi bahasize ubuzima kumbure hakiyongerako umwe canke babiri mu bajejwe umutekano bahasize ubuzima.Abantu begereye ahariko harabera ubgo bgicanyi baca batanga amakuru ku mbuga ngurukana majambo bariko baritabariza, abakoresha imbuga nabo bagaca babihanahana maze umwe wese akagira ico abivuzeko. Kubera ubgo bubisha buba mw’ijoro, Leta y’Uburundi ica izindukira gutanga itangazo y’ivyaraye bibaye bagasa n’abatanguranwa n’itangazo ryabo bakoze ibara ku rubuga rwabo.Ivyaraye bibaye buringa bisa n’ivyabaye mu gatumba bigasa n’ivyabaye ku ruhagarika bigasa n’ivyabaye na’ahandi hose aho abo batera bitrara mu bantu batobato kugira ngo ivyo bakora bivugwe cane. I Buringa baraye bishe abantu icenda bari basanzwe bari mu kigandaro baturira n’imodoka irimwo ikizoga bariko baritegurira kujana mu buruhukiro. Ivyo bakabikorera rimwe no gutera ku ngoro y’umugambge uri ku butegetsi aho bayiteye ibisasu barayisenyura igihande kitari gito. Ivyo nti biboneka nk’ibikorwa vyo kurwanira ubutegetsi mugabo ukuburwanya bifatanije n’ubugizi bga nabi.Uretse abantu basanzwe barwanya leta y’Uburundi baca, umwe wese yandika ibimujemwo kubera umunezero w’abakunda agapfa, hariho n’abandi bagerageza kwiyumvira ingene umutekano w’igihugu wokomezwa n’abajejwe umutekano canecane kugira ngo abenegihugu n’abajejwe intwaro nabo babafashe mu kubabera ijisho. Ivyo, bose ntibabitahura kumwe.Abo bavuga ngo umutekano guhungabana ni ibisanzwe, ngo no muri Amerika, Ubulaya n’uburusiya urahungababa, ni bareke kungereranya ibitangereranwa. Ubwambere nuko basa nukubona ko ibibera iwacu ari ibisanzwe ngo muri Amérika birabaho. Ninkaho wokwijajara ngo ntaco ibibera muri Congo n’ibisanzwe kubera no muri Gaza canke muri Ukraine biriko biraberayo. Nico kimwe n’abumva uvuze uti inzego z’umutekano ni zikomeze urugamba ugaca uvuga ngo nawe ingo wote umuriro urare kw’ijoro. Ivyiyumviro nkivyo sivyo. Twese ntitwoba abasoda kandi ntitwoba ba mbangamatwi. Bamwe bose n’ivyo bajejwe.Ikindi abantu bomenya nuko ubwicanyi bwo muri Amérika, ikibutera si kimwe n’iwacu. Iwacu ni ivya politke. N’uguhungabanya umutekano w’igihungu kumvo za politike nk’uko bavyanditse mw’itangazo ryabo ngo bagomba ibiganiro vya bose kandi binshingiye ku masezerano ya Arusha. Abashinzwe ico gisata babihemberwa bariho bakwiriye gukora neza gusumba. Muri Amerika abakoze ikibi baramenyekana bagahanwa. Uwo badashoboye kuronka bamusanga iyari. Wosingura gute k’ivyabereye mu Ruhangarika, ibombe yatewe kuri ca kiraro i Bubanza, hamwe kuri ya antenne ibintu biguma vyisubiza !Abantu biyumvira nk’uko ni baba bakora mu baducungiye umutekano, nibo bakora nabi. Abasoda, abapolisi, abashinzwe umutekano badakwiriye barongerezwa. Unsigura gute ko abantu baza i Gihanga bakarasa bakisubirira muri Congo atankomazi (sinzi ko uzi ikirere gihari) !Mu bisanzwe ikibazo c’umutekano w’igihugu ni ica bose mugabo abasirikare n’abapolisi nibo baja imbere gusumba abandi bose. Ingorane zihari ni ingene ihanga ry’abarundi ritunganijwe mur’ibi bihe kubera amoko, imigambge n’ubutunzi. Abahunze igihugu barafise uko babona ikibazo c’umutekano w’igihugu, abari mu gihugu nabo nyene barafise uko bamwe n’abandi babona umutekano w’igihugu bivanye n’imigambge barimwo, akazi bakora, amoko yabo, ubutunzi uko bgifashe n’ivyo bagiye barigishwa. Iyo mihari itera hari naho bibaza yuko itera ivuye hanze y’igihugu mugabo atariko vyama bimeze kuko hariho n’abari mu nzego z’umutekano w’igihugu batanezererewe ubutegetsi bg’igihugu ivyo bikaba vyotuma bakora ibikorwa vy’umwansi canke bakifatanya nawe. Uburundi burakwiriye gusubira kuvugurugwa mu vyerekeye les structures sociales na le renforcement de la capacite securitaire.

title: Amahoro araronderwa kandi arakorerwa. Abera nibo bategerezwa kuyateramira!
content:
kurondera amahoro.

» aburamu abarira loti, ati ndakwinginze, hoye kuba intonganya hagati yanje nawe, no hagati y’abungere banje n’abawe, kuko tuvukana. ereg’ igihugu cose kir’ imbere yawe! ndakwinginze ngo duhane intara, ni wahitamwo kuja i bumoso nanje ndaja i buryo; ni waja i buryo ndaja i bumoso. »[Itanguriro 13:8-9]

Aha Imana ntiyari bwahindurire izina Abiramu, ngo abe Aburahamu, be na Loti barabana, kuko yari yajanye nawe igihe Imana yahamagara aburahamu. Igihugu bari bagerereyemwo nticabakwira kuko bari bafise amasho menshi. Haca haba ugutongana hagati y’abungere babaragirira. Abiramu niko kumubgira ati ahitemwo aho abona ko ari heza kuri we, nawe araja ahazoba hasigaye, kandi niko vyagenze.

Burya amahoro ntiyizana,umuntu arayaharanira. Har’abantu mutopfa mwumvikanye, ngo mubane neza, atari wewe ubihisemwo. No gutongana bumva ataco bibabwiye. Aburahamu rero niko guhitishamwo Loti umwishwa wiwe ngo ahitemwo aho abona ko ari heza, we araja ahazoba hasigaye. Mu yindi mvugo,yaramuhebeye.

Kugira bikunde tubane amahoro n’abandi biradusaba kwiga kubahebera. Ushobora kureka umuntu akibwira ko ivyo ariko arakubwira arivyo, kuko ubona atiteguye gutsindwa, ivyo navyo akaba atakindi vyozana atari ugutongana. Ukagira amahoro mu gihe ataco vyica.

Iciza co kuba umunyamahoro n’uko bizana umugisha. Loti niwe yahisemwo heza, ariko imana yarahezagiye Abiramu kumurusha.Bibiliya niyo ivuga ngo umugisha w Uhoraho uratungisha kandi ntamubabaro awuvangamwo.

Abantu bashobora kwibaza ko bariko baragutsinda, muvyo bavuga, baronka,…nawe ko uriko utera uja inyuma, ariko burya hari amahirwe agendana n’abantu barondera amahoro. N’umugisha w Uhoraho utungisha,s’ugutongana. Ibi ntibisigura ko ukwiye kureka abantu bakakunyaga utwawe, bisigura gusa ko uca munzira y’amahoro kugira ugere aho ushaka.

Benshi baba mu mitongano n’abo bita ab’iwabo, abantu babo ba hafi kuko gusa batarahitamwo umwanzuro nk’uyu wa aburamu, wo kurondera amahoro. Bahora bagomba gutsinda impari, kwerekana ko ivyo bavuga arivyo, bagahora mu cuka kibi babihiwe, kuko abo bafitaniye ibibazo n’abo batiteguye kurondera amahoro.

Nimba kurondera amahoro kwawe bizogusaba kwivugira make, uzobikore.ico vyogusaba cose,uzogikore.amaherezo uzosanga ari wewe wahisemwo neza, kuko ntaciza kiva mugitongana, kandi n’Imana izobana nawe.Mwige kubana neza n’abantu bose kandi mwame murondera kugiranira amahoro n’abantu bose.

title: Umuntu wese arafise uruhara mw’ishitswa ry’umugambi b’Imana ku bantu.
content:
URUHARA RW’UMUNTU MUMUGAMBI W’IMANA.

« Bamaze kugenda, umumarayika w’Umwami Imana yiyerekera Yosefu mu nzozi, aramubgira, ati Vyuka, ujane umwana na nyina, uhungire muri Egiputa, ugumeyo gushitsa aho nzokubaririra, kuko Herode agira arondere umwana ngw amwice. »[Matayo 2:13]

Aha Yesu yari yavutse, Umwami Herode nawe agira imigabo yo kumwica. Imana ica ibihishurira Yosefu ngo ahungishe umwana na nyina.

Akenshi hari igihe dusenga ariko tukibagira uruhara rwacu mumugambi w’Imana. Hano vyasaba uruhara rwa Yosefu kugira ngo umwana ahungishwe,arokoke.

Igihe dusenze ibihwanye n’ivyo Imana ishaka, yo iba yiteguye gukora ariko hari igihe bisaba uruhara rwanje nawe mu mugambi wayo.

Ushobora gusengera ikanguro ariko Imana ikarindira ngo uruhara rwawe rugaragare(nko kubwira abandi ivya Yesu gushigikira abajanabutumwa,kurungikira abandi ijambo ry’Imana,…).

Canke ugasenga ngo Imana ihindure ab’iwanyu batarihana ariko ingeso zawe nazo zizobigiramwo uruhara.

Habe no mw’iterambere ryo kugiti cawe, Imana izotuma uruhara rwawe rugaragara kuko hari inyifato umuntu ayifise adashobora kugira aho yigejeje(nko gusesagura,…)

No mumigenderanire yawe n’abandi, Imana izotuma uruhara rwawe rubamwo, nko kumenya kubaha agaciro, kubaganiriza ivyubaka,…

Imana idufitiye imigambi myinshi ariko hategerezwa kugaragaramwo uruhara rwacu. Niwasenga ngo Imana iguhindure igikoresho cayo umenye ko uruhara rwawe ari ukwitoza kubaho ubuzima bw’amasengesho,bwirinda,…

Dukwiye kumenya rero ko Imana ari umufatanyabikorwa natwebwe, tugakora ivyo uruhara rwacu rudusaba nayo izoshitsa uruhara rwayo. Tube abantu bubaha Imana n’abakozi b’abahizi muri vyose.

title: Amabanga ya satani yamenetse niwe azibira imigisha y’igihugu.
content:
AMABANGA Y’IBITUMA AMASEZERANO ATANGIRWA NTASHIKEUmuntu akorana n’ubushobozi bg’ikuzimu, asanzwe akorera mu bihugu cumi n’umunani vyo kw’isi, vyamwanse munda kubera ibibi amaze gukorera abasenga araheza aserura amabanga y’ivyo bakora atuma amasezerano y’Abarundi ateba kwambara umubiri agashitswa. Burya abantu bakorana na satani baragisibije. Abo baja mu bgami bg’ikuzimu bakarondera ubushobozi bgo kuganza abantu baremwe n’Imana bakoresheje amangetengete. Kugira ngo batirwe mur’ico kibi, babanza gutanga ibimazi vy’abantu b’incuti, abo bakunda canke bagatanga abo bose babona yuko bafise umutima wokuzokorera Imana. Benshi mu bantu badakingiwe mur’iyo mirwi barahaguye abandi bari mu ngorane z’urutabanako.Inyigisho z’amadini n’amashengero nyinshi zanyegeje abizera babo yuko ikuzimu habaho. Benshi ntibabugurura amaso ngo bamenye yuko hariho ubgami tubangabanganye.Nk’uko hariho ubgami bg’Imana,nako hariho n’ubgami bga satani nkuko hariho ubgami bg’abantu mu gihugu. Ubgami bga satani ni ukuri kwamye, abantu barabujamwo bakagaruka, hari n’abaherayo. Hariho abajayo n’umuburi n’abajayo mu mpwemu. Igihambaye n’uko abantu bomenya yuko Imana yahaye abaremwe ubushobozi ku bgami bga satani. Yagize ati : « Kumenya Yesu Kristo ni amahirwe ugirirwa n’Uhoraho Imana. Ku bimeya nirwo rutare Yesu Kristo yubakiyeko ishengero ryiwe kandi n’amarembo y’IKUZIMU ntazorishobora. Ababizi yabahaye urupfunguzo rw’ubgami bgo mw’ijuru. Ico bazohambira mw’isi kizoba gihambiriwe no mw’ijuru, n’ico bazohamburura mw’isi kizoba gihamburuwe no mw’ijuru. » [Matayo 16 : 13-20]Ivyo bihemu vyagotse k’Uhoraho Imana bigakorana na satani vyacitse inkozi z’ikibi mw’isi y’abazima. Usanga barondera ubushobozi bg’ikuzimu n’amangetengete kugira ngo bagundishe ububasha bg’abadayimoni abantu kugira ngo babaganze. Abo rero ubasanga mu baganza ibihugu, abaganza mu ntwaro n’izindi nzego z’igihugu. Igitangaje n’uko n’abakuru b’amadini n’amashengero nabo nyene naho usanga bavuga « imana » bakoresha ayo mangetengete kugira ngo bagunde abizera bongere baganze abasenga bose. Abafatwa n’izo mpwemu zihumanye ni badakijijwe neza ngo bagiranire imigenderanire n’Umwami n’Umukiza Yesu Kristo kugira ngo abambike icubahiro c’ubudahangarwa bga Mpwemu Yera. Mur’abo nyene bakoresha imbaraga z’umwiza, harimwo abari ku rundi rwego rwo hejuru mu gukorera ibibi umuntu wese agomba kubaho ubuzima bgo kwubaha Imana butagira icaha. Babateza ingwara, ubukene, inzara, ubugumba, imiryano mu miryango, ukubengwa, impanuka, kubura akazi, ukwankwa n’abantu, inyatsi n’ayandi makuba menshi asanzwe ashikira abantu bintungane munsi y’izuba. [Yohana 10 :10]

Ivyo bikoresho vya satani, ni abantu baba bishikira i Kuzimu canke bagatuma abandi babashikirayo. Usanga bari mu baganza mu gihugu no mw’ishengero. Abo nyene bari mu ntwaro y’igihugu, mu madini n’amashengero nibo bagerageje kuboha, kuzibira no kuburizamwo amasezerano y’igihugu c’Uburundi. Bakora ijoro n’umurango kugira ngo bayugare, maze amaso y’abayarindiriye azohere mu nzira. Abo bangushi nyene mu kugwanya ayo masezerano Uhoraho yahaye igihugu c’Uburundi bakoresha inzira zo kurwanya abanyakarago, bagakoresha n’ubuhinga bgo kuyibagiza abantu kugira ngo ntibayasengere. Impwemu za satani nizo zahagurukije abakungu n’abatungu, imbundege n’abishira hejuru b’intakebga zikiyimika ziyitirira ayo masezerano kugira ngo abantu babe mu rujijo no kuzazanirwa maze bayazinukwe. Nta yinzi nzira wocamwo ngo ubarwanye atari mu masengesho y’inkomezi. [Abanyefeso 6:10-20]Uwo yari mu bakoresho vya satani yariko arabohoka yameneye satani amabanga menshi ayabarira abo yariko arasaba imbabazi bo mw’Ihanga Ryera ry’Imana. Yavuze ibikorwa vy’ububisha abo bantu tubona bagendagenda bambaye umubiri nkatwe mugabo bafise impwemu zo mw’isi y’umwijima bakorera abantu b’inyama n’amaraso. Kubera abaganza mu gihugu no mw’Ishengero bagararije Uhoraho Imana, nico gituma muzobona harimwo abapfa impfu zidasobanutse kandi ngo n’inkota y’Imana izobasanga ku kazi canke mu masengero bariko barasenga ibarandure. Impfu mwumva canke muzobona zose ntimuzozegeke kuri satani kuko Uhoraho Imana arahana atakigongwe iyo yaburiye abantu bakanka kwumva bakamugarariza. Ivyo yarabisezeranye. [Yesaya 13:11]Uwo mu shehe yongeyeko ati aha mubona abantu benshi bagenda barayinze kuko bashegeshwe n’ibibi bibashikira kubera ivyo bikoresho vy’ikuzimu biri mu baganza, mu madini n’amashengero mugabo abantu ntibabimenye. Batuma abantu gukora ibisesema imbere y’Uhoraho vyose. Yagize ati ivyo mwomenya yuko:

title: Muri umunyu d’Isi kandi mutegerezwa kugumana uburyohe n’akanovera mu bikorwa no mu ngeso.
content:
TWAHAMAGARIWE KUBA UMUNYU W’ISI.

« Umunyu ni mwiza, arik’ umunyu woshira uburyohe, mwoba mukiwuryohesha iki? Mugire umunyu mu mitima yanyu, kandi mubane amahoro. »[Mariko 9:50]

Umunyu uraryosha inrya, ndetse abenshi vyonabagora gufungura ivyo kurya utabirimwo. Ni nako umu Kristo iyo ari umunyu koko nk’uko bibiliya ivuga, ibintu birushiriza kuba ibiryoshe aho aherereye.

Nk’akarorero, abantu benshi bakorera ijisho. Iyo uri umu Kristo mur’abo bantu, ukora ibintu neza, umukoresha wawe yakubona canke ntakubone, kuko uba ugambiriye gushimisha Imana.

Ushobora kwihanganira abantu kubw’agakiza wakiriye. Ushobora guhezagira abantu kandi kuko Imana yabigushize ku mutima, atar’uko ubufisemwo izindi nyungu zindi. Ushobora no kwigira uworoheje kandi bose bakwubaha, ivyo ntubishireko umutima. Ivyo hamwe n’ibindi vyinshi n’ivyo bituma tuzana uburyohe aho tubaye.

Ariko rero, Yesu yabajije ati « umunyu woshira uburyohe, mwoba mu kiwuryoshesha ik? »

Harya umu Kristo azi ijambo ry’Imana, yakiriye Yesu, atakaje ivyamwa agasa n’isi, yoba akiryoheshwa n’iki?N’ivyo Imana yoshobora kumuhindura, ariko Imana ntihindura uwutayemereye.

Umukristo atari umunyu, ivy’agakiza biramubihira, kandi aba n’igitsitaza kubari mu mwiza bipfuza gukurikira Imana.

Nico gituma intego yacu nyamukuru nk’abizera, ari ugusa na Yesu, kwama ivyamwa bikwiranye n’agakiza twakiriye, kandi nivyo bikenewe kugira ngo duhagararire Imana neza mw’isi kuko nico twashiriweho.

title: Menya Ijambo ry’Imana kandi wuzure Mpwemu Yera.
content:
KUMENYA IJAMBO RY’IMANA NO KUZURA MPWEMU YERA.

« Umurwanizi aramubgira, ati Ni waba ur’ Umwana w’Imana, bgira iri buye ricike umutsima. Yesu aramwishura, ati Vyanditswe ng’ Umuntu ntatungwa n’umutsima gusa. »[Luka 4:3-4]

Abantu benshi barazi ijambo ry’Imana, kandi nivyiza, ariko ntibikwiye kugarukira ku kuri Menya gusa,ahubwodukwiye gusenga Imana ikadushitsa ku yindi ntambwe yo kwuzuzwa Mpwemu Yera.

Usomye haruguru y’uyu murongo, handitswe ngo Yesu yuzuzwa mpwemu yera,…,agendagendeshwa mubugararwa na Mpwemu,… »luka 4:1″.

Kumenya ijambo ry’Imana birafasha, ariko mugihe utuzuzwa mpwemu Yera ntakinini rimara, kuko niwe agushoboza gushira mubikorwa ico iryo jambo rikubwira.

Bibiliya ni nka ya mazubagurishirizamwo imiti (pharmacie). Iyo urwaye, ntupfa kunywa umuti uwariwo wose ubonye, ahubwo unywa uwuhwanye n’ingwara urwaye. Ariko uwo muti uwuhabwa n’uwuyitanga, si wewe uwiha. Niko no muri bibiliya bimeze. Haba hari ijambo rikugenewe ako kanya kandi buri musi. Ariko siwewe uryiha , urihabwa na Mpwemu yera arikurongorerako.

Nico gituma umwe asoma bibiliya agahembuka, uwundi we akumva ntaco bibiliya imufasha mubibazo abamwo. Aba asa n’uwafashe umuti uvura ikiguma kandi arwaye amaso. Uwo muti ntaco uheza ngo umare. Kandi iyo uwo muti uwuhawe n’uwategerezwa kuwuguha, aguha uwuhwanye n’ingwara urwaye. Niko na Mpwemu aguha ijambo rihwanye n’ubukene bw’umutima wawe.

Ikindi gituma dukeneye Mpwemu yera muguhabwa ijambo, n’uko burya Imana ishobora guhishura vyinshi kw’ijambo rimwe gusa usomye.

Rero, iyo uzi ijambo, ukaba ufise na Mpwemu yera , biroroshe cane kumenya ijwi ry’Imana nirya satani ndetse n’iryiwawe ubwawe.

Mpwemu yera niyavuga uzokwumva wuzuye amahoro, kuko kimwe muvyamwa vya Mpwemu yera harimwo amahoro, kandi kuko uzi ijambo ry’Imana uzoca ubigenzuza ijambo. Ibi birafasha cane iyo uri umuvugabutumwa,kuko wiyumvisemwo ijambo ukumva n’amahoro, uca umenya ko ari ijambo Imana igeneye ubwoko bwayo. Kikaba ikibazo iyo wahawe kugabura ijambo ry’Imana, ariko ukaba udafitaniye ubusabane na Mpwemu ngo aguhe kwiyumvamwo ivyo intama zikenera biciye mu mahoro y’umutima. Akenshi biterwa n’uko umuntu atakironka akanya ko gusenga.

Ninaco gituma bidakunda ko umuntu uwariwe wese abaho yuzuye Mpwemu mugihe atari umuntu akunda gusenga. Ashobora kumenya ijambo nivyo, ariko kwuzura mpwemu yera vyo umuntu abihabwa n’umwanya amara imbere y’Imana.

Iyo umukristo rero azi ijambo ry’Imana, akaba yuzuye na Mpwemu yera,usivye ko yama n’ivyamwa vyiza nk’abana b’Imana, anamenya n’imigambi y’Imana ku buzima bwiwe, kandi na satani ntapfa kumuhangara uko abishatse, kuko ben’uyo aba afise ikirwanishwa bishobora kumufasha gukomeza urugendo, kandi adaciwe intege n’umwansi.Wameusoma ijambory’Imanakugira ngo rirwire muri wewe kandi wame wumvira n’ijwi rya Mpwemu Yera kugira ngo akurongore.

title: Nyamugigima yumvikanye ku muhingamo mu gisagara ca Bujumbura.
content:
Hari ku masaha yo kumurongo aho nyamugigima yumvikanye ku masaha yo ku murango. Hariho abatayumvise mu gisagara hagati kubera bari mu rwamo rwinshi, mugabo abandi bayumvise kandi bibatera ubgoba.

Iyo nkuru y’iyo nyamugigima yaciye ihanahanwa n’abarundi iyo bari kw’isi hose bamwe bamwe bahora baca bayifatanya n’ivyo bizera bavuga yuko bagendereje canke n’ivyo bipfuza. Ije ikurikirana n’imvura ivanze n’umuyaga yahitanye abantu bariko barasenga ku munsi w’Imana uheruka aho bamwe bapfuye abandi barakomereka mu ntara za Cibitoke, Ngozi na Rutana.

Haciye ahanya gato ukwo kunyiganyiga kw’isi kwumvikanye mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, haciye hakwiravizwa ifoto ry’ibarabara ryacitse bavuga yuko ari i Nyanzalac bavuga yuko ari iyo nyamugigima yarisituye. Mugabo abazi gusesangura bavuze yuko iryo barabara atari mu Burundi mugabo yuko ari ishusho yo muri Ghana. Abari i Nyanza lac bemeje yuko ari ahitwa i Mukungu muri Nyanza Lac bemeza yuko atari imbeshere.

Abarundi dukomeze gusenga ubugombe bg’Imana abe aribgo buba ku gihugu cacu, ibiva kuri satani vyose bisendwe mw’izina rya Yesu Kristo.

title: Ukutizera ukivumbura bishobora ku guhushisha umugisha wawe. Gira kwumvira.
content:
KWIVUMBURA BIBUZA UMUGISHA.

» Elisa araheza amutumako, uti Genda wiyuhagire muri yorodani ibihetangabo ndwi, umubiri uraca usubira uko wahora, nawe uzoba uhumanutse. Ariko Namani aca araraka, arivumbura, ati Nahoze ngira ngw arasohoka ahagarare, atakambire izina ry’Uhoraho Imana yiwe, azungagize ukuboko hejuru y’aho ndwaye, ankize imibembe. Mbeg’ inzuzi z’i Damasiko, Abana na Farupari, ntiziruta amazi yose y’i Bgisirayeli? Sinoshobora kuziyuhagiramwo ngahumanuka? Nukw arahindukira, agenda aratse. »[2Abami 5:10-12]

Iyi nkuru ivuga kumugabisha w’ingabo z’abasiriya yari yagiye kwa Elisa ngo amusengere akire imibembe.Ariko alisa aca amutumako ati genda wiyuhagire muri Yorodani ibihetangabo ndwi, urahumanuka.Nawe aca araraka, arivumbura,kuko yari yiteze ko aza kwakirwa mucubahiro, Elisa akamusengera hanyuma agakira. Imana ishimwe kuko abagendanyi biwe bahavuye bamuhanura gukora ivyo yabwiwe na Elisa, arabumvira,hanyuma aca arahumanuka, akira imibembe.

Kwivumbura ni ikintu kibi, kandi birabuza umugisha.Akenshi biva ko umuntu ataba afashwe uko yar’avyiteze (nk’uko vyashikiye uyu mugabisha), agaca ahitamwo kuva mukibanza Imana imushakamwo. I aze,uyu mugabisha yar’agiye gusubirana inyuma ingwara yimibembe, yari imusesereje igatuma n’abantu bamubonako agasembwa, kubera gusa yanse kuja kwibira muri Yorodani incuro ndwi.

Burya iyo utahuye imibembe yawe (intege nke zawe), ntikiba kikiri ikibazo c’icubahiro cawe kugira ngo ukire. Nico gituma Imana ikoresha abantu bato, mukukurangira inzira ukwiye gufata. Ariko rero abenshi iyo nzira barayanka,bakivumbura.

Uzoca usanga benshi bacira imanza mu mitima yabo abo Imana ikoresha, kandi ariyo nzira iba yahisemwo mukubakiza imibembe(mukubkiza intege nke zabo). Ngo yize amashure angahe, none wewe ivyo avuga arabikora, ngo n’abana baramunaniye,…iyo ikaba impamvu ituma badashira umutima kunzira nziza bariko barerekwa.

Kwivumbura vyama bibuza umugisha imisi yose. Umugore bita Ana niwe yavyifashemwo neza. Yagiye mu rusengero kuririra Imana ngo imuhe umwana. Umuherezi bita Eli aca yibaza ko yaborewe, aca amubwira ngo uzogeza ryari kwama uborewe, genda uhebe vino yawe. Hana ntiyaciye yivumbura, ahubwo yaciye amubwirako… yaje gusuka amajojwa yiwe imbere y’Uhoraho. Umuherezi Eli aca amuhesha umugisha, ati Uhoraho aguhe ivyo wamusavye. Kandi niko vyabaye Ana ntivyatevye aca asama inda, avyara Samweli.Kwivumbura kwa Ana vyari gushobora kumubuza umugisha, agapfa ataronse akana.

Benshi bataye insengero basengeramwo,gusa ngo n’uko badafashwe uku canke kuriya. Umuntu akava mukibanza Imana yomuhereyemwo umugisha, gusa ngo n’uko afise umurongozi batumvikana,…abandi bagata ubuzi, abandi bagahagarika gukorera mungabire zabo,…

Umukristo ari murugendo, akwiye kurengera impamvu yose yotuma yivumbura,kuko bibuza umugisha. Mwenedata wese akwiye kugera kurugero aho akora ico Imana ishaka ko akora, niyo womenga ntibimwubahisha imbere y’abantu, niyo womenga abitumwe nabo aruta mucubahiro, cankemubwenge, kuko kwivumbura nta Mugisha ubamwo.Igihecoseuzumva ijwiry’Imanantukidodombe canke ngo wivumbure ngo yari gukora ibi canke biriya. Imana ikora uko igomba, wewe gira ukwizera no kwubaha ijwi ryayo gusa uzoca wishurwa kuko inzira z’Imana zirenga igihumbi.

title: « Agatikizo nkako karabashitsemwo Barundi » Umuvugishwa w’Umurundikazi yabonekewe.
content:
Tumaze imyaka irenga icumi twigisha Ihanga ry’Abarundi amasezerano Imana yahaye ihanga ry’Abarundi. Abavugishwa batandukanye baravugishijwe ibintu biteye ubgoba kandi vyose vyarashitse nk’uko vyari vyavugishijwe.

Aha twobabarira nk’ivyerekeye (1) imyiyerekano yo mu 2015 n’igerageza gutembabagaza ubutegetsi bga Petero Nkurunziza, (2) Urupfu rwa Petero Nkurunziza, (3) Ubukene, ubusuma, inzara, akarenganyo n’ubutegetsi butorohereza abeneguhugu inyuma y’intwaro ya Petero Nkurunziza, (4) Intambara ya Congo izohitana n’abasirikare b’Abarundi, (6)Iyicwa ry’abari mu rusengero n’isenyuka ry’amasengero ya Pentecôte n’ayandi nka za Ezeubu, (7) Inkota y’Imanaigiye guca mu gihugu c’Uburundi…

Mur’iy’indwi twatanguye, abahanuzi b’Abarundi bashika icumi bazwi neza kandi batazinayi babariwe yuko kubera abantu bagararije Imana haje intambara kandi zizomara abantu mu gihugu no mw’ishengero.

Uwambere ari gusenga mu mpere y’indwi irangiye, yumvise umuntu ariko arasemerera avuga ngo ngahongaho NTEGA/MARANGARA iratanguye.

Uwugira kabiri yubonye umuntu yambaye impuzu zera amubarira ati hagiye gutera intureka mu gihugu c’Uburundi kandi zizohitana Abantu benshi, ngo musenge cane abantu bihane.

Uwagatatu yumvise ijwi rivuga ngo ifirufumbi rirabaye mu Burundi kuko isezerano rirashitse ngo ehe ubutigu burageze.

N’abandi benshi beretswe ivyerekeye ibihe biri imbere vy’intambara, abantu bicwa kandi batagira iyo bahungira, umwe wese yicwa na mugenziwe,…

Uwo mupfasoni nawe wo mw’ishengero rya pentecote yeretwse ivyerekeye intambara n’iyicwa ry’abanyamadini kubera bazanye isi mw’ishengero.

Usanga wizera ivyerekeye yuko Imana ivuga kandi bigashika, tugusabe witegurire ibihe biri imbere mu mutima, mu Mpwemu no mu mubiri kuko biraje. Nta jambo ryavuzwe n’Imana ngo rigende uko. Kuri wewe utavyizera, uranzkumbura uvyizere kuko twe twarabivendereje kandi twarabibonye yuko ari ukuri. Urashobora kuba utabibona ubu mugabo vuba uzobibona, rero ntuze wicuze. Itegure!

title: Ukuri ukuvanze n’ikinyoma gucika ikinyoma kandi n’ukuri ukuvuze igice kuba ubusa. Abarundi barakinisha umuriro.
content:
Nahisemwo gukebura Abarundi bakoresha imbuga ngurukana majambo bitwaje yuko barwanya ubutegetsi canke babushigikiye maze bagasuka umuriro mu bantu bibaza yuko ari ibisanzwe. Inkuba irabije ntuvuga ngo mara Abansi kuko n’abakunzi irajaniranya. Hari vyinshi vyandikwa n’aba n’abariya bamwe bagiriza abo muri leta ukwica abantu abandi bagiriza abarwanya leta ukwicisha abantu. Mugabo uyu munsi ntituzindukanywe no kubeshuza uyu n’uriya canke kuvugira leta ariko duhamagarira umurundi wese kudahendwa ngo abure itiro canke ngo ahige kwihora mugenziwe muvuka gihugu kubera ibinyoma n’urwanko bikwiragizwa n’abandika canke bifata amajwi bakabisuka ku mbuga ngurukana bumenyi.

Uyu munsi hariho abantu bariko batuma imiryango irara idasinziriye mu gukwiragiza yuko Leta y’Uburundi yakuye uburozi mu gihugu c’Uburusiya kugira ngo yice naka na naka bari ku ntonde y’abarwanya leta abari mu gihugu n’abari hanze. Jewe sindi umuvugizi w’umuntu n’umwe ariko nagomba kwerekana yuko ivyo bivugwa n’abo bavuga babizi yuko ariIKINYOMA KIBISHE KANDI YUKO BARIKO BARIKURAKO AGASHAMBARA BO NYENE.

Abari ku butegetsi mu gihugu barashobora gukora ibishoboka vyose harimwo n’ibibi bibishe kugira ngo bakingire ubutegetsi bahawe ariko mu migambi bakora ntiharimwo kugemurira uburozi Abarundi bahungiye mu mahanga canke abari hano mu gihugu kuko ntibarashika kur’urwo rugero. Abahana ishano bararihana hagati yabo ariko ntibabiririra abahunze igihugu.

Uretse yuko abari ku butegetsi bafise abansi hagati yabo nyene birirwa barahigana, nta mwanya wo kuja kurondera uwutakiri mu Burundi canke Uwo badafise ico basangiye. Umwansi w’ukuri n’uyo mwirirwana azi uko uryama n’uko uvyuka kandi agufitiye inzigo n’umugambi wo kukugirira nabi. Uwuri kure aba ari kure nyenye.

Uretse yuko abarundi bazi kwicana bahanye ishano risanzwe riba ritekeye, canke bimwe bita indugwe y’ingona, uburozi bukoreshwa n’abarusiya busaba ubuhinga bginshi kuko ubutera umuntu canke ukabushira muvyo afungura canke anywa mbere bukanatumuka mu muyaga kuko na wewe ubumuhaye bukakwinjiramwo ku buryo wewe wabutanze uca ujanwa kuvuzwa imiti ihambaye itanaboneka iwacu kandi ku gihe kirekire kuko ubgo burozi buba bgakwinjiyemwo.

Ubgo burozi bavuga bukoreshwa n’abantu b’abahinga bavyize bakaminuza mu bihugu vyarutura kandi bakuwemwo ubuntu kuko baba bitangiye inzego z’ubutasi bakavyigishwa kuva bakiri bato kandi bakamenya yuko bazorangiriza ubuzima bgabo mur’ivyo nyene. Ivyo mu Burundi ntabihari.

Abarundi ni batekane nta leta y’Uburundi iriko irabarondeza uburozi mu gihugu canke mu mahanga. Imiryango n’iryame isinzire irwane izindi ntambara. Iyo leta n’iyigira imigambi yo kuza kubica izokoresha bga buhinga mwese mukoresha kuko murazi yuko namwe nk’abarundi barundi mutoroshe muzi ingene ibibi bikorwa.

Abo bakwiragiza ivyo bihuha vy’uburozi bo barazi ico bironderera aho mu bazungu, kwiyita yuko baronderwa bibaha kwimenyekanisha, guhabga ubufasha, kwikundwakaza ku bantu, kuronka ivyo barya batavunitse, kwitwa yuko bakunda Abarundi kandi bariko barabarwanira, no kurondera n’ubundi burushosho bg’abantu badafise inyuma y’urugo. Mu Barundi co kimwe no mu banyamahanga hariho abantu bama babeshwaho canke bahimbarirwa no gucuruza urwanko mu bantu. Abo ntakindi bakora.

Iyo iciba nkico gihuha casutswe mu bantu, ingo zose , imigwi yose n’imiryango yose ntakindi bavuga kuko bakigira ikibazo co gupfa no kuzuka. Benshi bumvise yuko hari umuntu batamenye yamye kubarondera bibaza yuko ari babarozi. Babonye umuntu batazi canke ikintu batamenyereye vyose bavyita bga burozi kuko abo bakwiragiza ibihuha nk’ivyo barazi ahica. Barazi kugumura abantu gushika naho bokwisuka ku risongoye canke Abarundi bakamarana bishimikije amoko, imigambge canke aho baturuka.

Nk’uko bakwiragije ubgoba mu bantu ngo leta irabumviriza ku matelefone iyo bahungiye bose bakagwara inyoko ngo nivyo maze tukabahumuriza yuko ari ikinyoma, n’uyu munsi turabahumurije yuko ata nzego z’igihugu c’Uburundi ziriko zirabahigisha uburozi.

Ni mwiyubare ku bindi, mwiyumvire ingene igihugu canyu coronka amahoro n’umutekano, ubutungane n’iterambere kugira ngo abanyu bazobe mu Burundi bg’Isezerano.

Nti tuzotinya kuvuga ukuri ngo n’uko kurwanywa na benshi ngo natwe botugwanya. Yesu yavuze ngo muzomenya ukuri nakwo kuzobaha ukwidegemvya.

title: Mu kubaho hariho aho abantu badashika mu kugufasha kuko ari Imana yonyene ishobora kuhagukura.
content:
ABANTU HARI AHO BADASHIKA.

« Nukw’ashira umwami w’Abisirayeli ico cete, cavuga, ngw Ico cete ni cagushikira, urabona ko nkurungikiye umusavyi wanje Namani ng’umukize imibembe. Maz’ umwami w’Abisirayeli asomye ico cete, yitantamurirakw impuzu ziwe, aravuga, ati Mbega jewe nd’ Imana, ngo ntume umuntu apfa canke ngw abeho, k’uyo mugabo andungikiye umuntu ngo ndamukize imibembe? Ehe raba ingen’ anyigenzako, muheze muvyiyumvire! »[2 Abami 5:6-7]

Iyi nkuru ivuga k’umugabisha w’ingabo z’abasiriya yitwa Namani yar’arwaye imibembe. Asaba umwami w’abasiriya kuja mubisirayeli k’uwuvugishwa n’Imana Elisa, nawe uwo mwami aca amurungikana icete aha umwami w’abisirayeli. Ico cete camusaba ngo amukize imibembe. Nawe umwami w’abisirayeli asomye ico cete aca ararakara,yitantamurirako impuzu, avuga ati ehe raba ingene anyigenzako, mbega jewe ndi Imana, ngo ntume umuntu apfa canke ngw’ abeho…?

Akenshi iyo umuntu ari mubibazo hari igihe yiyumvira naka, ati yonkemurira ikibazo,yonyiyumvirako ivyanje vyoca bicemuka. Ariko buriya abana b’abantu barafise aho batagera, kuko nabo wibaza ko boba bafise vyose, nabo buriya bagendana imitwaro ibaremera batabwira abandi, nabo baba bakeneye ubutabazi.

Hari ibibazo bicemurwa n’Imana yonyene. Uzorabe,abantu bogukomeretsa bigakunda, ariko urets’Imana abantu ntibogukiza ibikomere vy’umutima wahuye navyo. Abantu boguha ibintu(usivye ko naho nyene ari Imana yoba ibakoresheje), ariko ntiboshobora kuguha amahoro y’umutima atuma ubaho wishimye.

Rimwe na rimwe hari igihe umuntu agendana akababaro, ngo ba naka ntibankoreye ibi canke biriya, ariko burya ivyo wibaza ko batagukoreye sivyo vyonyene war’ukeneye kugira ngo ubeho wishimye. Niyo bakabikora, hari kuboneka izindi mpamvu zituma ubabara.

Nk’akarorero, umuntu yokurihira amahera y’ishure. Ariko Imana itabanye nawe ngo iguhe gutahura ivyirwa, wotuntuzwa no kwama muri iryo shure utunguruza. Umuntu yokuronderera akazi bigakunda ariko Imana itaguhaye kugira ikiganza ciza, wotuntuzwa no kubona wama mu nduru n’abo mukorana canke wotuntuzwa no kubona abaza bakugana batakwiyumvamwo.Nimba wipfuza gukorera Imana, abakozi b’Imana (Imana ibibashize kumitima) boshobora kugusengera,bakaguha ibango runaka. Ariko Imana itabanye nawe ngo iguhe ubwenge bw’ingene ubikora, navyo wobitunturiramwo,kuko no mugikorwa c’Imana hari intambara umuntu ahura nazo.

Imana rero niyo ishoboye vyose. Ntugahange amaso abana b’abantu kuko  usivye Imana gusa, nta wundi muntu n’umwe yoshobora kugucemurira ibibazo vyose ufise. Nivyo Imana izokoresha abantu kandi nabo ukwiye kuzobibashimira. (kuko sibose bemera ko ibakoresha) ariko ukwiye kumenya ko hari aho abantu batazoshika mu kugutunganiriza ibibazo, usivye Imana gusa.

title: Léonce Ngendakumana avuga ko Gélase Ndabirabe ari mu banyuruje amafaranga yari agenewe kurwanya ikiza COVID19
content:
Uwahoze arongoye inama nshingamateka y’u Burundi Léonce Ngendakumana avuga ko biteye isoni kumva umukuru w’inama nshingamateka Gélase Ndabirabe hamwe n’umushikiranganji ajejwe ikigega ca Leta bifatira mu gahanga abashingamateka bari kubaza irengero ry’amafaranga yari yagenewe kurwanya ikiza Covid -19 hama Gelase ndabirabe agashigikira uwurongoye ikigega ca Leta akamukingira ikibaba ngo ntakwirikiranwe vyerekana ko bayasangiye.

N’inyuma yaho Audace Niyonzima arongoye ikigega ca Leta avugiye kuri uyu wa kane ko amafaranga arenga imiriyaridi 3 z’amafaranga y’amarundi atazi irengero ryayo hama akagirako asaba abashingamateka ko bobirekera aho kuko atazi iyo ayo mafarabga yazimiriye.

Leonce Ngendakumana avuga agira ati:«birababaje kubona abashingamateka bari kurondera umuco kw’izimira ry’amafaranga hama umukuru w’inama nshingamate agaca abirekera ngaho kandi atamuco utanzwe .ayo mafaranga yokoze mu kubaka amabarabara meza,hakubakwa uburaro bwiza ariko aherera mu mifuko y’akarwi k’abantu badashira inyungu imbere z’abenegihugu.ikibabaje ubu abashingamateka bakwirikirana inyungu zabo gusa narirya hariho ibwiriza rivuga ko bagukuye canke bakwirukanye mu mugambwe cank ukikurayo kubera utemeye ivyo bariko barakora uca utakaza ikibanza c’ubushingamateka.ikindi nuko inzara n’ubukene bituma abashingamateka baba ba seniryo».

Twibaza yuko amategeko atari make y’igihugu c’Uburundi yosubirwamwo kandi hagashirwaho inzego zigizwe n’abakunda igihugu zo kuyakingira no kuyubahiriza. Milliyaridi 3 yamarundi ntiyozimira mu kigega c’igihugu ngo bipfukapfukwe uko mu gihugu kigengwa n’amategeko. Miliyoni 147 z’amadolari ya Amerika ntizozimirira mu kigega c’igihugu kira mwaka ngo bipfukapfukwe kuko Ico ni icaha gikomeye mu gihugu kirimwo abagabo. Umushikiranganji w’ubutunzi bg’igihugu agira ati ivyo ntimubimbaze ni murekere aho kuko adashaka kwerekana yuko ubgo butunzi bg’igihugu bunyuruzwa n’umuryango w’umukuru w’igihugu ngo ace ahereza mw’ibohero rikuru nk’uko vyadhikiye uwahora arongoye ikigega c’’igihugu BRB yazize kuvugisha ukuri imbere y’abahinga ba FMI na Banque Mondiale. None igihugu c’Uburundi kizoguma kirongowe uko nyene ari icanyuma kw’isi nyene!

title: Naho ababisha baguma biyongera, iciza kizotinda kinesha ikibi. Ube mu ruhande rw’abeza.
content:
ICIZA KIRANESHA IKIBI.

« Ikibi coye kukunesha, yamara ikibi ukinesheshe iciza. »[Abaroma 12:21]

Muri kamere y’umwana w’umuntu, gukora ikibi ntibisaba ko avyigishwa. Kuva Adamu acumuye,n’abamukomokako bose bavuka bafise iyo mbuto yo gukora ibibi. Kiretse iyo umuntu yakiriye Yesu, akabatizwa muri Mpwemu Yera, agahinduka icaremwe gishasha. Ico gihe kamere y’Imana ica itangura kuganza.

Ariko rero kameremere ntica ipfa, irabandanya kurwana kugeza upfuye. Nico gituma ataho umuntu agera, kuburyo atoba agisubira inyuma. Har’abibaza ko batoba bagisubira inyuma, ariko sivyo, nimba ucambaye umubiri, burya uracari mu ntambara. Mbere hari n’ababa barageze kure kurusha aho ugeze, ariko basubiye mu vyaha kandi umenga bari bazi vyinshi, baragendanye n’Imana bihagije. Nico gituma bibiliya ivuga ngo mugendeshwe na mpwemu, niho mutazoshitsa ivyo kameremere kanyu kipfuza.

Aha twasomye havuga ngo « ikibi coye kukunesha, ariko ikibi ukinesheshe iciza ». Mu yindi mvugo, uburyo bwiza bwo kwirinda ikibi, n’ugukora iciza.

Ushobora kuba ufise ikintu kigutwara umwanya wo gusenga, wo gusoma ijambo ry’Imana. Ico kintu, umusi wafashe umwanya ugiha ukawuharira gusenga, no gusoma ijambo ry’Imana, uko igihe kigenda uzosanga umutima wawe wawerekeje ku Mana, ube uranesheje.

Uramutse ufise integenke zo kuvuga abandi nabi, umusi wihaye intego yo kuza uratera intege abantu no kuza urashima mumajambo yawe ivyo abantu bakora, uko igihe kizogenda uzosanga warabohotse ku kuvuga abandi nabi.

Integenke zawe ashobora kuba ari ukwihebura,ukwiganyira. Umusi woza uratura amajambo y’ivyizigiro, canke ukaza urasubiramwo imirongo ya bibiliya ivuga ukugira neza kw’Imana, uzosanga kwiganyira bigenda bitsindwa.

« Ikibi coye kukunesha, ariko ikibi ukinesheshe iciza »

Mumigenderanire nayo tugiranira n’abandi, birashika umuntu akakugirira nabi, bikakubabaza umutima. Burya uburyo bwiza bwo kubinesha s’ukumusubiriza mu koko,si no kumumaramaza,ahubwo n’ukumukorera iciza mu gishingo c’ikibi. Ibi ntivyoroshe ariko usenze Imana yobigushoboza kuko ikibi kiranesha iciza.

Ntidushobora rero kunesha satani mugukora ivyo ashaka, nico gituma n’ubwo abantu boduhemukira,twebwe dukwiye kuba abantu bakora ivyiza aho bishoboka hose, kuko nivyo twahamagariwe.

Duhamagarira umurundi wese eka n’umuntu wese ashobora gusoma aya majambo kwikubita agashi akava mu nzira mbi mu bikorwa, mu mvugo, mu vyiyumviro akama abandanira kuba mu ruhande rw’abariko barahira ibibi vyiza mu kwigisha n’abandi ingeso nziza zibereye abubaha Imana n’abantu.

title: Uhoraho Imana irareka tugaca mu bigeragezo kugira ngo bidukomeze natwe dukomeze abandi kuko adukunda.
content:
IMWE MU MPAMVU ITUMA DUCA MUBIGERAGEZO.

» Imana y’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo, ari yo Se, iragahezagirwa, Data wa twese w’imbabazi, kand’ Imana yirura imibabaro yose, itwirura mu marushwa yacu yose, kugira ngo natwe tubone uko twirura imibabaro abari mu marushwa yose, tuyibiruza uko natwe twiruwe n’Imana. »[2Ab’i Korinto 1:3-4]

Iy’umuntu ari mukigeragezo akenshi yiyumvira impamvu Imana itakimukura imbere, ahubwo yo ikabandanya ikimurekeramwo kandi asenga. Gusa,imibabaro imwe n’imwe Imana irashaka ko tuyicamwo. Uti gute?

Twasomye ko Imana itwirura mumibabaro yacu ngo natwe tuze tubone ingene twirura abandi, tubirura uko natwe twiruwe n’Imana. Muyindi mvugo, hari ivyo Imana itwigisha mukigeragezo kubw’inyungu y’abandi.

Imana irabona abazoza inyuma yawe ibibazo bazocamwo,igahitamwo wewe kugucisha mubibazo bisa neza neza n’ivyo abo bazogukurikira bazocamwo. Wewe Imana ikabana nawe,ego ukababara, ariko ikaguhumuriza biciye mutuyira dutandukanye twayo. Igihe rero kiba kizogera Imana ikakigukura imbere ico kigeragezo. Ariko umubabaro wagize niwo Imana izokoresha mukuguhindura igikoresho co kwirura abazoca muvyo waciyemwo, kuko uzi neza ingene bamerewe, kuko warabiciyemwo.

Imana ntaco vyoyimarira kukubona ubabaye, ariko kuko ibona ingene uzobera umugisha abandi, irahitamwo kugucisha aho udashaka ariko ibona ko hakenewe.

Nabonye ko Imana iyo iretse ukaba impfuvyi hari igihe iba igomba kukuremamwo umutima w’ubuvyeyi.Ishobora no kukureka ukarwara igihe kirekire kugira ize ikurememwo umutima wo kwitaho abazohura n’ibibibazo ben’ivyo. Ishobora no kukureka kandi ukarenganywa kugira ize igukoreshe mukurenganura abandi,…

« Imana rero itwirura mumarushwa yacu, kugira ngo natwe tubone ingene twirura abandi, tubirura uko natwe twiruwe n’Imana ». Nico gituma muvyo ducamwo,atari vyiza kwidodomba, ahubwo dukwiye gusenga ngo Imana itwigishe ico ishaka kutwigisha, hanyuma inyuma y’ivyo Imana ntizotureka uko, kuko igambirira kutugirira neza. Gusa akenshi, iba ishaka kuzodukoresha mukwirura abandi.
